title: Freddy is the best!!!!
text: With Freddy at the front desk helm, I know our stay at the Ace NYC is always going to be flawless. He is so kind if we request an early check-in, making no promises but doing his best to accommodate our family. His steady presence is a main reason we stay at the Ace every time we come to NYC.

title: Slept like a baby in shear comfort
text: The Ace Hotel NYC ….. what comes to mind…. Clean-space- enjoyable- friendly front desk-non hassle-great bed- soft pillows- great water pressure- lovely bath products, I mean they really are stellar-safe hotel- ideal location- what’s not to love. The front desk is always happy to see you- love how I can control how bright the lights are in the room with them all on Dimmer Switches- you control the brightness- every room I’ve had I slept well and I’m a light sleeper and ask for a quite room. This is the hotel for a light sleeper. I look forward to my next business trip here. There is no question where I’m staying I’m staying here!!! My coworker loves to try out different places and complains why change a great thing I’ll stick with my Ace Hotel!!!!

title: Your perfect hotel in Manhattan
text:
Perfect hotel in manhattan! 
The staff were amazing, patient and friendly. 
Every request or questions we had they helped 
With pleasure 
The hotel itself is gorgeous and super clean. The location is prime with coffee shops and breakfast spots a minute walk. 
Our room was big (which is hard to find in nyc) 
100% recommended.

title: They make you feel SPECIAL!
text: I KNOW that I am not special. Whenever we stay at The Ace Hotel NYC (which has been multiple times) we are ALWAYS made to feel special. Why would we stay anywhere else? Freddy is so nice, and always made us feel welcome everytime he saw us. Juan always takes care of us with a smile on his face- they take good care of our bags, and hail us a cab when we need it. We truly feel so welcomed here everytime we stay, and they make us feel special, when we know that we aren't- but that why we will continue to stay at THE ACE ♡

title: Birthday Perfection at The Ace
text: My entire experience at the Ace Flation from start to finish was seamless - all made possible by Freddy :) He was so helpful and made sure my birthday weekend was special. I entered the room to a handwritten note  room and a perfect view of the Empire State Building

title: Best in class customer service for my first time in NYC
text:
I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at the Ace Hotel. For this trip, I was travelling solo so safety was something that was really important to me. I felt incredibly safe and secure in my room and the reception staff were so helpful and friendly. Incredible customer service from the moment I arrived to when I checked out. Juan Julio gave great assistance with airport transport recommendations which helped me avoid the crazy cost of an Uber/Taxi. All other interactions with staff were top tier - couldn't fault :)

My room was one of the smaller single rooms but it was honestly perfect for my 5 night stay. Even better, the room had an amazing view of the Empire State Building which was a fun surprise :) The room was clean and maintained throughout my stay and also received prompt assistance when I was having trouble with the shower (it was user error... lol). I also took advantage of the lobby cafe and bar for an easy breakfast and coffee before heading out for a day of sight seeing. The bar was also great for a nightcap after catching some shows in the evening. 

Location-wise, it's also perfect. Within walking distance to many of the big attactions. 

I hope to return again soon :)

title: Great location, comfortable beds, but...........
text:
This is a gloomy hotel, the impressive lobby bar is bizarrely very dimly lit during the day, and the corridors and lighting in the rooms continue the theme.  The lobby bar is popular, hip, crowded and really loud in the evening.

The bed was amazingly comfortable, but if you prefer firmer pillows, you may want to bring your own.  Nice big screen TV, new SMEG refrigerator, yet tired bathrooms and only a couple of cubbies to store clothes, no drawers.  It's NYC so there's always lots of noise outside, but it was wasn't particularly intrusive in the room.

Due to an unfortunate room malfunction, we were quickly upgraded to a more spacious room.  The staff managed the issue reasonably well, but the promised complimentary bottle of wine never materialized.  

The hotel also charges a chunky $35 daily Destination Fee which covers free WiFi, access to the gym etc.  The WiFi was adequate for e-mail/browsing but streaming was hit-or-miss. The compact gym has some excellent equipment, including a rowing machine, but the aircon wasn't working, so since it's located in the basement with no windows, it was essentially unusable for a decent workout, although the sign suggested keeping the gym door open to let some air in until it was fixed......

But it's a fantastic central location making walking or CitiBike great options to see the city, the point of our visit.  The amazing Hotwire deal helped paper over the the cracks in our stay - at full price, we would have been dismayed.

title: Staff is super friendly and helpful - room was horrible -no drawers,no closet & tiny and no lighting. Old & dated hotel.
text: Old & dated. Very dark hallway. Room dark, no drawers or closet to unpack. Mattress sagged into middle. Worst room ever had. Staff was terrific though. A funky "cool" vibe but never would stay at this property again! For almost $400. They should do better with rooms👎

title: Great spot in the centre
text:
Stayed as a family with a baby. 

Staff were really accommodating, rooms were a little tight with the cot added in but they did check with us everything was alright and we made do. 

Was lovely and clean inside rooms, and the bar area downstairs is really cool with a chilled vibe. 
Didn't feel awkward / uncomfortable having a baby with us at all.

Snacks in the room are very expensive but to be expected with city centre hotels. 

Great spot to walk to all the sights from. Good pizza place just round the corner for if you want a quick late meal.

Overall would recommend to anyone after a good city centre hotel.

title: Amazing stayyyy
text: Stayed at Ace NY with one of my friends over the week/weekend and loved every minute of it! Great location and amazing staff! Freddy checked us in with all smiles, and Juan, Julio and Roy helped us in and upstairs! Super smooth! We walked and went up to the Empire State Building (YES WALKED) and what an experience! Juan and Salvie also held our bags at checkout and put us into a clean and friendly cab to the airport! My stay at Ace NY was perfect and I will be returning!

title: Another amazing stay!!
text: I had such a great stay at the Ace! David and Jesus at the front desk took such great care of me as always. This is my go-to hotel in NYC (and Palm Springs, but that’s another review)  because of the location, vibe, and amazing service I receive every time. I had to do some work on this trip and the lobby was full of other folks working on their laptop. It was a great environment and I just had to walk a few steps to the bar to reward myself! I definitely recommend the Ace!

title: Fun Place!
text: This hotel is truly a gem. Great coffee at Stumptown, great bagels at Blackseed, great bar menu + Milk Bar. The staff is super friendly. Matt especially was very accommodating when I wanted to move to a room with a bit more natural light. I highly recommend checking this place out on your next trip to New York

title: Ace hotel best experience
text: I stayed in room 1212, came back here with my friends for a birthday celebration. We started the party in the restaurant and continued in the lobby, the experience was unique, amazing music, the vibe in the lobby was unique, good DJ, hotel staff, front desk was excepțional. Happy to be back to ACE and i will return each time to Discover an outstanding experience.

title: Ace NY, exceptional experience
text: I stayed in room 714 with an heartbreaking view at Empire State, wonderful room service, very clean rooms, the hotel staff, front desk were exceptionally and also very  pet friendly, my 2 dogs Mia and Stelli were mega spoiled. The bellmens were very helpful and smiling all the time. Overall 5 star hotel experience

title: Ace Hotel New York where the staff treat you like family!
text: Every time we stay at the Ace Hotel NYC we have an awesome experience.  Overall, Ace Hotel  is more than just a stay—it's like visiting family. The staff's warmth, attention to detail, and genuine care made our trip so memorable. The entire team always goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome. Huge shout out to Michelle and Freddy who checked us in this last visit, they really made my husbands birthday trip even more special and it truly touched our hearts.  Also, the housekeeping is always exceptional, our room is always impeccably clean and tidied.  We always say we can't wait to return to  see our extended family again. If you're looking for a place where you're treated like more than just a guest, Ace Hotel NYC is the perfect choice!

title: Love the ACE
text: Love the Ace!!  Kind of hip, kind of chic, kind of industrial feel.  Check in was easy, staff friendly.  Elevator a bit cramped and slow, but it got us where we needed to go each time.  Security card read on the elevator.  The room was pretty average NYC in size, bathroom a bit small...but it had a nice toilet, shower/bath, and vanity.  Bed was comfortable, nice having a refrigerator, and the guitar was a plus.  We had a direct view outside our window of the Empire State Building.  The lobby is a central hub for this hotel.  Rather dark and a bar at one end, but always filled with people working on their devices, others just chatting away....warm and cosy.  Location is great and metro station just around the corner.  We would definitely come back here when visiting NYC.

title: Great modern hotel
text: Gorgeous hotel with fantastic staff and great amenities. Gym is open 24h which is great, although the lack of air con in there can get uncomfortable at times. My only fault was how close the bathroom door was to my bed (had to be tactical about getting in/out) and that there was no complimentary water in the rooms ($9 for a minibar one). Absolutely fantastic location and atmosphere, great beds and modern rooms. Will definitely be returning!

title: Amazing
text: This hotel is amazing the staff just cannot do enough for you. The hotel itself is spotless the rooms are beautiful and really big. We stayed in 303 we had a mini fridge water everyday and coffee and tea facility. The hotel itself has everything you could possibly wish for. The pool in the roof is amazing and very tranquil. The lady in the breakfast Lales was lovely greeting you every morning no matter time with a lovely smile and so friendly. We will definitely be back

The Ace Hotel New York just has an amazing vibe. As soon as you walk up you can feel the energy and see how trendy they are; anyone would feel comfortable and welcomed there (including your pets!). All the employees I encountered were super friendly. The location is the best. The are so many cute boutique shops, a variety of restaurants, and parks all just within a couple of minutes from the hotel. The area feels very safe as well. The rooms are beautiful and very spacious, which is rare in NYC. Would definitely recommend and return. Thank you for an awesome stay ACE NYC!

title: It was love at first stay!
text:
Absolutely LOVED the Ace! Perfectly located within walking distance of everything!!!! And then you get an amazing sleep at night in their super comfortable beds.
I loved the bar downstairs with it's spicy mango margarita that was curated in house...we had one every evening after our adventures :D 
The staff are amazing, made it feel like a home away from home. Loved the fellows at the front desk who helped us every day with anything we needed - Freddy, OSage, Salvie, Juan and Julio. Quick, helpful and super friendly, thanks so much guys!!!! We'll be back xx

title: You should go!
text: Such a friendly and helpful staff.  The Lobby was just great for coffee or cocktails. We loved our room and had everything we needed.  This place has a wonderful vibe.

title: Great location with nice amenities
text: The hotel is well located. We easily travelled by subway to Brooklyn, visited the nearby flower mart, saw a Broadway musical and found many great places nearby to eat.  Breakfast in the cafe off the lobby was wonderful and there were ample places to camp out with the laptop.   Bed comfortable and love the way the room was furnished!

title: Allez y!
text: Hôtel au design immersif dans l’univers New-yorkais, un lobby qui vous fait basculer dans une ambiance incroyable, des chambres aux allures vintage qui complètent le tout. Le personnel est extra, à tous points de vue. Demandez une chambre au 9ème sur la 29st…vue imprenable sur Empire  state bulding. Je recommande vivement ce lieu, qui contribue au côté grandiose de la découverte de NYC.

title: unexpected flaws
text: Whent there for the easter weekend with my 2 kids.  Hotel is perfectly located, the staff is great, the room was cool and confortable.  The kids loved the place with the little shops connected (café-icecream-juice).  I'm a really easy traveler and don't complain about things but at 500$ a night i think you should have the basic needs coverded like a good night sleep and hot water to take your shower.  Maybe we where unlucky and by reading the comments, looks like we where but still, we didn't have hot water for the showers in the morning.  Also, we where on the 5th floor facing West and the poor quality of the window was such that we could hear people speak on the street so imagine the garbage/delivery/fire truck during the night... I got up in the middle of the night to check if my kids left open the window but it was closed. The frendly person at the desk was sorry for the troubles and didn't charge me the destination fees of 80$.  That was kind of him but I am still disaponted of my hotel choice.

title: A true wonder
text: Michelle on the front desk was a delight, she knows her job is helpful and exhibits the personality your hotel should live up to. What a wonderful addition to your hotel. She is kind and knowledgeable about the city. Your industry needs people like her she helped make our nyc experience much more fun

title: My favorite hotel in NYC
text:
I stay here every trip to New York, the vibes are just right. It gives your friends apartment. It’s sarcastic, it’s cool and hip, and central makes it easy to get around. I got to say the highlight of my trip and more to come was Freddy at the front desk. He took such good care of me was kind and authentic. Made my trip all the more better. Any questions, concerns, or need I had he made sure to get it sorted right away happily. Really makes you feel welcome and connected. I recommend this hotel to my friends and will continue booking here and meeting cool people like Freddy in the process. 

And peep the sick artwork he did on my welcome card such a sweet addition. Definitely made me feel special.

title: Fav place to stay in NYC
text: Freddy at the front desk is so helpful! I had a complicated situation and he made it super easy. Love this hotel, great location, and great customer service. The bar is fun, gym is clean and had the equipment I wanted and the rooms are really nice. Request a higher floor if you want better views and light.

title: Catchy vibe and nice people
text:
Ended up here after our earlier stay @ACE Palm Springs. Very warm welcome by receptionist David. Nice rooms and great shower! The vibe is modern, where Bohemian chic meets industrial. Check it out!
Smalk minus point: if you want a quiet room, ask for backside because Broadway can be noisy at times.

title: ACE Hotel NYC - My Go-to Destination for My Birthday Weekend
text:
The Ace Hotel NYC is my go-to destination for my birthday celebration each year, as well as, additional NYC visits. This year, it was enjoyed by my wife, my son and myself. From the minute I walked in the door I found the staff to be welcoming and helpful.

I love the design of the lobby and rooms, and I took advantage of the offerings at the Ace Hotel coffee bar. In addition, the convenience of Stumptown Coffee and Black Seed Bagel connecting to the lobby is a major plus for me.

In addition, this year, the Ace Hotel was hosting a DJ event in the lobby during my visit. My family and I were able to take advantage of this during the evening.

Again, a big thank you to the staff and management of the Ace Hotel NYC! You never disappoint when I come to visit.

title: Cool midtown hotel
text: This is the best hotel I've stayed at in years. The small but mighty room is perfect for a solo traveler, the bar is hip and fun, great coffee is right off the lobby, and it's an easy walk from Penn station. Demerit? The Brooklyn hipster at the front desk suffers from advanced ageism. Presumably that will abate as he ponders his own fate

title: excellent Service
text: David Back went above and beyond to ensure that we found the right room for our family.  I emailed the general inbox to inquire about the different room options, and he went above and beyond .  It is rare that you find an individual that takes care of you before your actual stay. Grateful for the hospitality before stepping onto the property.

title: Ace staff comes through again
text:
Love the Ace! Was there 10 years ago and the service is as good, if not better, today. When our homebound flight was cancelled while we were en route to the airport, Michelle & Freddie made sure we were settled back in as if we never left! Michelle got us a room that was perfect: roomy for 2 with a great layout. Facing 29th street was amazing for people-watching and listening to city sounds. 
Checkout equally easy again the following day. Definitely will be back

title: This hotel exceeded all expectations!
text:
I had an exceptional stay at the Ace Hotel! From the moment I arrived, everything was wonderful.  The check-in process with Marco was seamless, and the front desk staff went above and beyond to assist with our requests (shout outs to Michelle, Freddy, Roy, and David). 

The hotel bar has fantastic cocktails and a vibrant atmosphere, adding an extra layer of enjoyment to our stay. Plus its ideal location makes exploring the city a breeze. Also, can't forget to mention the amazing water pressure in the shower – a small detail but it added to the overall comfort. 

When it was time to leave and we couldn't secure an Uber to the airport, Juan promptly arranged a taxi for us, saving the day. The attentive service during our stay and kind staff truly made our experience five-star. Highly recommend!

title: Great affordability, ambiance, location and staff!
text: I have stayed at the Ace hotel a couple of times now, and I appreciate its affordability, ambiance, location, and friendly staff.  The lobby bar and restaurant always feel vibrant.  When I'm in NYC for a visit, the Ace gives me everything I need.  They respond to requests in a timely and friendly manner, also making me feel welcome and appreciated as a guest.  I can't recommend them enough.

title: Looking for a fun, cool, and unique stay in NYC, the Ace is the place to be
text:
I love the Ace Hotel.  There is no match for its energy and design in the city.  The experience starts with the laid-back lobby that feels like a hip coffee house during the day and a cool bar at night.  While your fellow guests are creative professionals from Europe and LA, they provide a uniquely NYC ambiance.  If you are comforted by the typical hotel room appearance of boring mass-produced furniture, this isn't the hotel for you.  Each room is uniquely decorated with a mix of cool industrial antiques and original art.  No college dorm mini-fridges, the rooms have Smeg refrigerators.  The larger rooms also come with a guitar.

There are plenty of hotels in NYC that are very nice but could very easily be set in any other city in the country.  The ACE is where you stay if you are looking for an NYC experience or you're an interesting person who wants a space that feels like home.

It isn't the NYC version of the Chateau Marmont. There aren't celebrities in residence and refrigerators aren't nearly as well stocked.  But it is as close to the look and feel as you will find at any hotel in NYC.

title: Great hotel for former New Yorkers!
text: This hotel reminds me of everything I love about New York! Michelle and Jesus were so accommodating when I arrived. They could tell I had a long flight and got me sorted right away. Michele then checked in to make sure I was settled and sent up some goodies! Will definitely stay here again!

title: This hotel has everything!
text:
One of the coolest hotels I’ve stayed at! Gorgeous lobby with old school feel and amazing bar. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The best water pressure I’ve had in a hotel, seriously! My stay was made even better by the helpful staff - David Spillane, Juan, Michelle, Freddy & Roy! They were so gracious, friendly and accommodating. 
The hotel is also in perfect location, great restaurants nearby and easy access to all the different nyc neighborhoods! I can’t wait to come back!

title: Well-Located for Big City Adventurers
text: This midtown hotel is consistent with all Ace Hotel properties, as a stylish & refurbished option.  Great walkability rating, and subway close, Ace Hotel NYC is an affordable choice for travelers who are not spending too much time in their room.  The room was quaint, quirky and met our overall needs for a few days.

title: Great stay
text:
Had an amazing stay at the hotel, everything was perfect. The rooms are spacious and clean and the location is perfect. Also, David, the Manager, was extremely attentive and helpful. I could not ask for more out of a hotel. 

I’ll definitely be coming again!

title: Nice enough hotel and….
text: Clean, mostly nice stuff, comfy bed, quiet, nice view from hotel room, weird university-owned ski lodge dorm room decor, painfully loud music on ground floor, well-located, poor lighting in room (like two beds share the same reading light, mediocre hotel restaurant food, expensive daily resort fee; it ain’t a resort, and there are no amenities, so what’s with that?!

title: Super tight
text: The lobby is beautiful, the vibes are immaculate, the rooms are clean and comfortable, the bar has a good collection of spirits, and the entire staff was so nice & helpful. Special shoutout to our man Freddy for all his accommodations and help.

title: 2024 first day @ Ace Hotel New York
text: We were a family of five. Our three daughters from 20-30 liked the hotel. Service & attention was on point. 10 on efforts from front desk all parties,greatness from Freddy,luggage dept. sharp,house keeping females & male very polite. For being a older building and a crazy New Years busy week. They provided a nice comfortable,clean sheets,functional shower,cozy room with daily up keep to serve its purpose. I was grateful to be a guest.positive stay for us. Ty

title: Ace Hotel definitely not a winning card.
text: Ace Hotel definitely not a winning card. Customer service is weak, lots of socializing at the front desk but that personal  hustle is not translating into hustle to accommodate customers - more focus on the kiki and than the outcomes. The hotel wants to be hip but feels more poser and lacks personal touch.  In a city with A LOT of other choices, I am leaving this hotel card on the table.

title: Great
text:
Todo muy muy bien! La ubicación excelente, los accesos al subte, el clima de lobby, todo.
El tamaño de las habitaciones muy bueno, solo que se nota que estan un poco viejos los muebles.
Destaco la amabilidad, hospitalidad y buena onda de Freddy en la recepción. Que con su calidez nos hizo sentir como en casa. Para volver!!!!

title: Ace staff is awesome
text: Freddy at the front desk is amazing. Very professional and always is a big help on my regular business trips. The concierge group of guys are awesome as well. Juan is always very helpful. It’s cause of these employees that I feel comfortable and they are why I keep coming back. Thanks Freddy! Thanks Juan. And Joey in security is very helpful.  Thanks to Joey as well.  Cheers.  Purdom.

title: Ace is Bass
text: I felt so comfortable and in my groove there. Lobby always had people and great energy. Staff were super kind and smiley. I should have written this review right after my stay, but Michelle (I believe was her name) was very helpful at the front desk each time I locked myself out and extended my stay, which I did twice because I was very happy at the hotel, in the neighborhood, and the price was great. Each staff member I interacted with was friendly and personable and acted excited to perform their role. I also enjoyed listening to local radio in the room as well. And they have a robe for use while there, and a hair dryer, iron, ironing board, stocked fridge (pricy), great soap, and a wine bottle opener. Comfy bed and pillows. I’m now arriving in Seattle and am going to book a stay at the Ace here due to the wonderful experience and affordable rates.

title: Beyond Excellent Experience
text: Beyond excellent customer service from beginning to end.  All interactions with the front desk staff was friendly and helpful especially Freddy.  A big shout out to our cleaning staff for keeping our room stocked and clean and to Roy was fantastic and great to talk to.  The end of the trip was a fabulous send off from Juan. He kept our luggage stored before our we left, arranged our taxi to take us to the airport and even loaded all of our luggage in the car for us.  He wished us safe travels and had a big smile the entire time.  We will definitely stay here again.

title: Friendly staff, comfortable room
text: I had a great experience at the Ace Hotel, especially with the friendly and efficient staff at the front desk, who responded to my requests quickly and kindly. My room was comfortable, had a fantastic view of the Empire State Building, and was surprisingly quiet for NYC. The impressive yet still cozy lobby is a perfect place to wait for an appointment. And I enjoyed the lobby bar for a quick breakfast.

title: Amazing Hotel
text: On arrival at the hotel, we were made to feel extremely welcome.  Our late check in went seamlessly; just what you need after a long flight! We were situated on the 7th floor and had a view of the Empire State Building which was an added bonus.  I chose this hotel because of the room sizes and I wasn’t disappointed.  There was more than enough room for the four of us in our room: The room was spotlessly clean too.  The area the hotel is situated in is excellent and we always felt safe.  It is easy to walk to so many attractions and the subway is also close.  We couldn’t have been more happy.  Thank you to everyone at The Ace Hotel for making our stay so special.

title: My Night At Ace Was Amazing
text:
I wanted to thank the Ace Team for all the little details you considered that made my night at Ace unforgettable and so fun + enjoyable!

I toured a hospitality industry colleague - and she was blown away by the Loft Suite detailing: “they just get everything right!”

I was able to go seamlessly from coffee to cocktails in the lobby, and left my 24 year old nephew there to meet his crew for late night rumpus.

title: Mother/Daughter Trip
text: Great Location! Cute and quaint.  The perfect stay for my daughter and I.  We were able to walk to everything we wanted to do in NYC. (Theater. shopping, sites, and restaurants). Our room was clean and extremely comfortable.  The lobby reminded me of a cozy speakeasy.  Our check in service from Freddy was superb! He made us feel so welcomed :) We will be staying here again!

title: MUST VISIT AGAIN!
text: I had an amazing stay, great location, the room was super comfortable and cozy, awesome view of the Empire state building w/ an amenity meeting me at my room.  Julio greeted me at the door & helped with my luggage & Freddy, Michelle were wonderful @ the front desk & got me to the room that I desired! Will definitely stay again!

title: Home Away from Home
text:
Freddy at the front desk was so helpful & friendly! We were stranded in the city during the storms, & we were feeling lost & Freddy made us feel very welcome … 
The lobby at the Ace is very beautiful- lovely lighting & lots of cozy places to sit … like an old fashioned library …

The rooms had less amenities than our beloved Ace DTLA, but we were glad for the feather pillows & other trappings of familiarity that we love about The Ace ..

title: Perfect stay in the Big Apple 🍏
text: We had a perfect stay at the hotel.  Matt and Freddy in particular were super helpful.  The location is great, everything was within walking distance from shops, to restaurants, to landmarks and the subway. Our room was spacious by NY standards and it was cleaned every day, spotless! There was a cafe, juice bar and bagel bar with access  just off the lobby.  Would definitely recommend Ace Hotel!

title: Great Location / Vibes
text:
I stay at the Ace Hotel in New York whenever I'm in town for business. Instead of gifts this year my wife and I decided to go to the city for a few days of art museums, the ballet, and some great food.

We stayed in one of the corner suites which is more like an apartment than a hotel room. Everything was great and I highly recommend trying out this hotel. The lobby has a vibe each night and a great bar and Stumptown coffee is ready to get you going in the morning.

The staff was great and they even left us a couple of drink vouchers.

title: Loved it!
text: This hotel is beautiful! I stayed here for a few days while in town for business and it was super comfortable and has kind of an old New York feel. The staff were super friendly and made an effort to make me feel welcome which is not something that I’ve experienced at all of the hotels I’ve stayed here in the area. Will definitely be staying here again on my next trip.

title: Up to Moms standards!
text:
My mother is very particular, and every holiday season when she comes to visit the city the only thing more stressful than getting everything done at the end of the year is finding her a place to stay (my apt is not up to par…). I couldn’t be more relieved with the Ace! 

While checking her in everyone was super courteous and kind, and the room was so clean - not a single comment from her (this a big deal)! It’s close enough to landmarks and walkable places, but not so busy and in the middle of all the noise.

100% recommend.

title: Great bar to hang out and chill!
text:
The bar and staff are really fantastic!
There is a great selection of drinks, and the staff is very eager to provide guidance.
It has a gigantic lobby, and there are also very cool lounge chairs that are great to hang out and chill with friends in!

title: Cute time
text: Went here with friends to have drinks before the holidays and had a great experience. The drinks are always yum and the ambiance divine! Would Definitely recommend coming here for drinks with friends. Make sure to get there early to catch a spot on the couch!!

title: What a stay!
text:
During my recent stay, I was genuinely impressed with the overall experience. The team at the hotel went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable. From the moment I checked in, their courtesy and attentiveness were evident. They were quick to address any queries or requests, creating a welcoming and accommodating atmosphere.

One aspect that truly stood out was the dedication of the cleaning staff. The room was consistently maintained at impeccable standards. It was evident that a meticulous approach was taken to ensure cleanliness and hygiene. I appreciated the attention to detail, and it significantly contributed to my overall satisfaction during the stay. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this establishment to others based on my positive experience.

title: A special stay over Christmas
text: I was staying at the Ace Hotel by myself over Christmas, and really appreciated how welcoming everyone was. My family was in contact with Freddy at the front desk to secretly organise a christmas gift for me, and he couldn’t have been more helpful and kind. Wrapping the gift and the personalised note were so sweet, and I am so grateful that he went the extra mile to make my time so special. I would definitely stay again and really value how kind and courteous all of the staff were.

title: Great time
text: Ace is a great hotel, great staff especially Freddy. He took great care of us for our stay. Room was clean and a good size. It has everything you need. Close to Penn station, it’s a great spot especially to stay away from Times Square

title: Nice hotel in heart of midtown
text: Ace Hotel is in a very convenient area of Manhattan and rooms are large for NYC hotels. Staff are very friendly and helpful. They changed our rooms from the noisy 2nd floor to higher floors. Special thanks to Juan who was  helped us with the luggage and getting a ride to the airport. Will visit again.

title: Couples retreat
text: Visiting the city with my girlfriend for my birthday and decided to stay at Ace Hotel. Glad we did, had an easy and fast check thanks to Jesus. The room was clean and the location was perfect for everything we had plan during our stay.

title: Ace hotel is the way to go if you want five star treatment with affordable prices
text: Amazing customer service!!! Jesus, Michelle and Freddy made my stay an unbelievable experience. The room was very clean and bed is extremely comfy. If you are visiting New York or just need a staycation, Ace hotel is the way to go

title: My Favorite NYC Hotel!
text:
My trip can best be described in one word... Wow! 

Fantastic location, amazing staff, and very trendy loft-style rooms. Like the Empire State Building (which happens to be a few blocks away), the Ace Hotel is at the top of its game. I travel to NYC frequently and was impressed by the elevated experience that the Ace Hotel curated. It is at the pinnacle of excellence, right on the intersection of where comfort meets luxury. 

Pro tip: The "Miss Me Yet" rye and bourbon cocktail at the Lobby Bar is also a MUST! Needless to say the drink name is ironic because I already miss my exquisite experience at this world class property!

title: A wonderful New York visit
text: During my recent stay, the standout feature was undoubtedly the hotel staff. Their genuine warmth and unwavering commitment to guest satisfaction created an atmosphere of genuine hospitality. From check-in to check-out, their attentive and friendly approach made a lasting impression, turning a good stay into a truly exceptional one. Kudos to the remarkable staff for making this experience memorable.

title: Delightful stay
text: Candidly, my recent stay surpassed expectations. The room was spotless, offering a refreshing sense of cleanliness. The staff's genuine warmth and attentiveness were standout features, creating an inviting environment. Positioned in a prime location, it effortlessly combined comfort and convenience. This hotel has earned my enthusiastic recommendation for those seeking a delightful and hassle-free stay.

title: THANKS ACE NYC!
text: As always-- the ACE delivered in spades. Fantastic location, spacious and comfortably eclectic room-- and an engaging staff that were the highlight of the experience. There was an aura of safety, security and privacy at the ACE during my stay which I greatly appreciated. Special thanks to Juan, Julio and Roy for the kind assistance-- hope to be back soon in 2024. By the way, the French Onion Soup at the Lobby Bar is a must.

thanks to the stuff for making sure things went RT for my family and I, big shout out to Freddy, he went beyond duty to help us out. Front desk service was amazing and the hospitality was top tier. Great job

title: Industrial Chic Hotel
text: The Ace Hotel New York offers a vibrant and trendy stay in the heart of the city. The industrial-chic decor, combined with attentive staff, creates a unique and inviting atmosphere. The rooms are well-designed with a mix of modern amenities and artistic touches. The on-site dining options and bar provide great culinary experiences. However, some guests may find the rooms a bit small. Overall, a stylish choice for those looking for a distinctive urban experience in New York City. Kodie is a great addition to the team, she was so helpful and made our stay extra special.

title: Ace Couple’s Trip 2023
text: My girlfriend and I had the best stay. We met up with other friend couples in NYC. The location is amazing and the staff were incredible. Big shout out to Kodie, she hooked us up with some great restaurants to go to. Will definitely be back!

title: Ace…you’re still the one! The best in NYC!!!
text: So happy that The Ace continues to be the hippest, friendliest and most welcoming hotel in NYC. I have stayed here three times already this year and looking forward to my upcoming stay over the Christmas holidays. The staff, many of whom have been there for a long time, are absolutely the best and always go out of their way to ensure an amazing guest experience for all.

title: Freddy the GOAT
text: First and foremost, I rarely leave reviews. But I felt the service I received from Freddy deserved recognition. Upon leaving my room I placed the “not now” magnet on my door as I did not want service on my room. When I returned my room had been serviced and most of my personal items moved. I went to the front desk to discuss this issue, and this is where encountered my guy Freddy. Freddy was very understanding of the situation, assured me the hotel would provide the necessary support (investigating/checking cameras) if items were missing from the room, and made sure I felt the situation was being handled appropriately. He also phoned housekeeping, and discussed their side of the situation with me. Freddy was great to work with and has the guests best interest in mind! Highly recommend Freddy and his service! He made a great stay that much better.

title: Comfortable rooms in convenient location
text: Comfortable room that easily accommodated two guests — more spacious than other places I’ve stayed in NYC. Well appointed. Great staff. Convenient location. Good for business or personal travel. Would definitely stay here again on a future visit.

title: Overpriced, small, non-practical rooms - avoid.
text:
The location of the hotel is very good/central. Close to Broadway, 5th Ave. etc. Walking distance to most things.

However, the hotel itself is overpriced for what it is. The rooms are dark, small. Electric window blinds that constantly break, the taps come off in your hand when turning them - it's just and/or trying too hard to be retro/old style. It's very dark, lighting is bad in the rooms. The beds are not comfortable. It's just not a practical hotel - e.g. the TV is situated in the room, around the corner from the bed, so you can't even lie in the bed to watch TV. No ice machine on any floor, you have to go downstairs. Nobody answers the phone at the frontdesk, or rarely does / long waiting time to get any pickup.

I will say the cleaning staff are prompt and do tidy the rooms well.

title: Amazing stay at The Ace, Dec 2023
text: I enjoyed a truly phenomenal stay at The Ace. I hadn't been for many years, and was so happy to be back. The location is excellent, very close to subway, bed was incredible, and even with a buzzy lobby vibe, my room was quiet. I actually felt restored after spending a night here which doesn't typically happen in city-that-never-sleeps NYC.

title: Great staff and location
text:
Great hotel, fantastic location for all the tourist sites in NYC ,  5 minutes walk from the Empire Sate building ,  25 mins from Central Park.
Really good bar and adjacent restaurants.
But stay in an upper floor room and try to be courtyard facing- we stayed one night on the 4th floor and it was really noisy from local builders / deliveries first thing.
Saying that the staff we amazing, moved us right away with no fuss.

title: Eclectic and Charming in the heart of NY
text:
I’m hooked!  From the incredibly friendly staff to the little room perks, the Ace Hotel in NYC is my new go to when I’m in town. The lobby vibe is something to be experienced. The transformation of the lobby to an eclectic people watching scene come evening time is a highlight. 

Rooms were quiet and comfortable. The cute bath robes were a nice touch as well as the stocked fridge. 

The front desk staff, especially Freddy, made sure I had everything I needed and then some. I look forward to getting back to NY soon!

title: Love!
text: Loved this hotel! Perfect location! Perfect place if here for work or fun. Staff was great. Freddy at the front desk was especially wonderful and very helpful during our stay! Wish I could’ve stayed longer.

title: Hip Warm Welcomes Are The Best!
text: After the long flight from the west coast to JFK I cannot begin to sing enough positive praises of the warm welcome from Michelle at the front desk here at the Ace Hotel! In a world full of so much negative I applaud & will tell the hotel manager they must give Michelle a raise & make sure to show here this review! Thrilled to be staying here again & cannot wait to have my morning coffee in the super hip library-style lobby!

title: Family of Four loved The Ace Hotel!
text: Stayed overnight with my family of four (two teen boys) in two rooms - one medium king, one with bunk beds.  We loved it!  Cool, stylish boutique hotel.  Warm, welcoming staff.  Rooms well-appointed with vintage fridges, turntables.  Eclectic range of art - there is something to look at or read everywhere - so many hidden gems on the walls.    Centrally located but also hidden and quiet.  Can get to any other neighborhood easily and within walking distance of Penn Station and Grand Central Station.

title: Another wonderful stay at the Ace in New York
text:
I had a wonderful stay at the Ace in November 2023. It's always my hotel of choice when I travel to NYC, but this visit was particularly special. My room was so comfortable and the bed was fabulously cozy, with really good pillows and soft sheets. The bathroom had all the amenities, and of course everything was super clean and well appointed.  Also they even left me a coupon for a complimentary drink at the bar, which was thoroughly enjoyed. I also loved that they had the radio on with music playing when I arrived to my room. It just added to a feeling of being welcomed, like I was coming home. Such a nice touch!

I particularly appreciated the warm and authentically friendly service at the front desk. I was greeted immediately upon entering with smiles and offers of assistance. It really makes the visit when you receive wonderful hospitality from the moment you arrive. I can't say enough good things about the staff and the hotel itself. I already can't wait for my next visit.

title: Great place, The Ace
text: I stay at the Ace every other month when I go to New York for work and I love it.  It is in a great neighborhood, surrounded by great places to eat and ease to get all over the city by subway.  The staff is awesome and the rooms are clean and quiet.

title: Great as always
text:
As always, no mistakes here.
The room carries all you needs
The lobby makes you liveable and young
The location is perfect to go anywhere in the city.
The staff is always helpful and friendly, especially my man Freddy

title: Ace Hotel New York
text: Ace Hotel New York - Excellent service ., Fantastic location , Functional and a lack of insulation on the windows and thin walls .The decor is funky rooms. Up graded rooms and original artwork , fridges and turntables. The rooms are fully air conditioned. Fully accomodating staff. Neat and clean sorroundings. Very fresh and classic. And also the restaurant  is so accessible and presentable.

title: Stay at the ACE Hotel in Manhattan
text: The room  clighting was too low, the pillows were too soft, there was a fully stocked fridge, and the room had an industrial vibe.  We went to the bar, but we were mostly ignored by this Middle Eastern looking bartender.  He only came to our end of the bar only whecn White man sat down.  That’s when he waited on us.  Very sad that Black prime are still being treated differently.  However, the Front Desk Clerk, Freddy brightened the day with his pleasant and energetic personality.  He gets 5 stars for service.  I told him we were repeat customers.  He made sure we felt welcome.  ACE needs to work on some things.  It’s kinda going down hill since the pandemic.  It’s in a good location to Macy’s,shopping, and the subway, but be careful of your surroundings.

title: All in all a great hotel
text: I love the Ace. Yes, it's a little grungy and needs a cleaning but that's part of the charm. I stayed here nearly 3 weeks and had a pleasant experience. The bar is fun, it's nice that there's a bagel shop next door, the gym is a little small and dank though. The one in Brooklyn has a much nicer gym. But all things considered I love the Ace. It's not perfect but it's damn good.

title: Fun, cool hotel in perfect location
text: The location of this hotel is excellent. Newcomers, this is way better than Midtown where most people stay when they don't know NYC. Walk to Moynihan and Penn Stations as well subways, not to mention just a great hood on it's own. Have stayed here twice now. The lobby (and the rooms) is a great place to work and people watch, as well as cocktail in the evenings. Front desk staff has been so helpful and friendly. The rooms are larger than typical NYC with vintage features (good and bad - bathrooms are small if you're tall and may only have rain showers based on room). Rooms have refrigerators, which is a nice bonus if you're there more than one day. As long as it's affordable for the nights I need, will be my first choice for NYC.

title: Too cool for its own good
text:
The best thins about this hotel is there location, smack in the middle of Manhattan in a very funky neighbourhood full of fantastic food and bars and close to good transport. The downside is the hotel
Itself. Too cool for its own good, and just not that comfortable. Bathrooms and floors were dirty, we were moved because of cockroaches in our first room. Lovely staff and good service but the rooms have thin walls, the bathrooms are dated and no amount of cool retro furniture and wall murals can hide the fact it’s not very functional.

title: Not for business travel - Dorm room vibes - hot with no A/C, no desk
text:
I've been to the Ace in Palm Springs and LA, and both are great so I was disappointed when I stayed at the NY location. I was on the top floor - my room was hot / humid like a laundromat and they send an engineer up to tell me the building doesn't have air conditioning, which was a first for me in a hotel. They only offered me a fan, my room was tiny and it didn't have a desk or hard surface to work from. 

On the plus side, it was dog friendly and the restaurant was amazing, don't plan on spending much time in your room and I'd avoid if that's a mandatory for you.

title: Won't go anywhere else
text: Our 36 hour stay in NYC was absolutely the best thanks to our stay at  ACE Hotel. From the moment we arrived the staff was warm, welcoming, helpful, resourceful and aiming to please. The room was clean and so comfortable for three adults, a rarity in Manhattan. Freddy went above and beyond in helping us solve a mild crisis and did so with expediency and compassion. Jesus had great restaurant recommendations and literally every staff member was a delight. We are frequent visitors to the city and will definitely be back to ACE Hotel thanks to a truly A+ experience from start to finish.

title: Freddy!
text: Freddy at the front desk is wonderful!!  Very helpful upon arrival and getting me a room, even a tiny bit early because they were a bit slow on this day!  From explaining all about the bar, restaurant and coffee shop on location, to inviting me to an art opening the following night held nearby, just a total sweetheart!

title: The best of the best hotel experience
text: This magnificent hotel excels in every way. Not only is it perfectly located in Manhattan but an extremely well run hotel that has a je ne sais quoi that sets itself apart. From initial check in to departure my experience at the Ace was beyond exceptional. The team members are all warm, welcoming, very accommodating, going above and beyond in every way. Furthermore the room was extremely hip and stylish yet extremely cozy. The restaurant and coffee shop on site are both amazing and a must check out. All in all 5 stars aren't enough for this stellar gem of a hotel.

title: Cool, black, HTBQIA+ friendly, jazzy hotel with a great location!
text: My favorite hotel in New York! Cool, black, HTBQIA+ friendly, jazzy hotel with a great location! My teenager’s absolutely loved it and felt at home. If you are looking for something cool but safe, trendy but working and with a good enough location at a reasonable price for NY you should try Ace Hotel.

title: The absolute best of NYC
text: Love this place!  Warm, friendly, quirky energy! The staff are great, the rooms are perfectly comfortable and the location is the best part. Nomad area!! I have not stayed anywhere else since 2020😊❤️

title: Exceptional Stay at the Ace Hotel in NYC
text: The Ace Hotel in NYC was an absolute delight to stay in. Every aspect of the hotel, from the friendly staff to the pristine rooms, exceeded my expectations. The bar stood out with its chic ambiance, offering a perfect space to unwind after a day in the city. The location is convenient, adding to the overall appeal. I've had my share of hotel stays in NYC, and this one is at the top of my list. I'm already looking forward to my next visit, and without a doubt, I'll be booking a room here again.

title: Power Washing Dumpster 4am
text: Staying at the hotel, nonstop blaring, and music, followed by trash removal from the dumpster and all power washing. Worst nonstop noise ever. We have 3 rooms tonight and tomorrow. Not sure I will get any sleep this weekend. Skip this noise-ridden hotel.

title: Great Spot! Will be back
text: Love the ACE i usually stay at the Palm Springs property so this was my first “city” ACE experience. The bar is great. I was traveling solo before a work trip. Seemed to be a mix of locals and the typical ACE but (NYC) clientele. My queen room on the corner was comfy. I never love dark walls but  it didnt matter. Was only needed a place to land. I wouldnt want to work from the room for a full day. Pleanty of peeps on their laptops in the lobby. Great location-made nomad/midtown ish area feel more fun.

title: Cool Vibe
text: I loved the vibe of this hotel! The location was perfect, the view was amazing, the decor was stylish, the room was spacious, the lobby coffee was delish, and every hotel employee was super nice and helpful! I especially liked talking to the manager, David. I will definitely stay at this hotel again :-)

title: Perfect for our wedding weekend!
text: We're so glad we chose the Ace Hotel for our wedding weekend! My now-wife and I booked suites for ourselves and our parents and it worked out super well! The staff were very hospitable (including Freddy & Cody) and the suites were incredibly spacious while being impeccably designed. The location worked out well for us (our venue was a short walk away) but there was also a ton of restaurants and shops nearby (including a coffee shop in the building). The only criticism is that, early in the morning (at 5AM) we did hear some garbage trucks on Broadway (it's Manhattan after all), so light sleepers may want a room facing 29th St. All in all, though, we loved our stay at The Ace Hotel!

title: Wonderful stay
text: Had the pleasure of staying at the Ace hotel. The room was 10 out of 10. Slept like a baby. All of the staff was extremely attentive. Great coffee and pastries for breakfast in the lobby. Will definitely go back.

title: Ace feels like home away from home!
text: The Ace feels like home away from home. It's the only hotel I could ever imagine staying in in NYC. Its distinct charm and character set it apart from other city hotels.Truly a refreshing gem in one of the best parts of the city. Shout out to Freddy for his incredible care and expertise in making the customer experience truly exceptional.

title: Love this Place
text: I really love the artsy vibe of this place. Love the decor and clever signs placed around the property. The staff is super friendly and helpful. The room was super cozy and felt very "New York," which was what I was seeking as a visitor from California. The food at the cafe downstairs was yummy, which accounts for me ordering the avocado toast three days in row and I love that there is a bagel shop and juicery conveniently adjacent. Would definitely stay there again.

title: Great for groups of friends!
text: Came here with a bach party and it was perfect. It was an easy walk from the train (Penn Station). It was a cool vibe and had a nice bar in the lobby. The rooms were stylish and roomy. Any and all accommodations that we need we got. Highly recommend for your stay!

title: Great location, great rooms!
text: Came here for a bachelorette and it was perfect! Huge room, great views, attentive service, and chic decor. After a long night out, the beds were perfect to catch up on rest. The bathrooms were also really large, so multiple girls could get ready at once. The full length mirrors throughout the unit also came in handy for pictures. I also should mention the location is so close to penn station so getting in and around the city was a breeze!

title: The Most Unforgettable Weekend!
text:
I stayed at this hotel with a group of women for my best friend's bachelorette weekend. From the moment I stepped into the foyer I was impressed by the very intentional industrial chic design. The lobby evokes feelings of old New York, and it's very easy to sit down with a cocktail or a coffee and forget about the rest of the world around you. 

Being in New York, I wasn't expecting much in terms of space, but to say I was in shock was an understatement. I was astonished at how much space we had in the room, in addition to a gorgeous bay window overlooking Broadway. It really felt like we were in our own apartment, and definitely contributed to an amazing ambiance for the entire weekend. 

I got to the hotel very early due to my train, and the staff at the front desk was more than happy to store my belongings until my room was ready. This made it so easy for me to take a quick stroll down to The Strand bookstore (the best bookstore in Manhattan IMO), while I waited for the other ladies to arrive. As long as you have a good pair of shoes, there are SO many places you can walk to from this hotel. The Empire State Building, Herald Square (Macy's), and Times Square are less than 10 minutes away. In the other direction, you have Madison Square Park, the Flatiron Building, and Union Square, not to mention a ton of great bookstores, vintage boutiques, restaurants, cafes, and bars to stop at along the way. This location is true Midtown, making it easy to have a full day without even needing the subway. It's also very easy to hail a cab in this area if your itinerary calls for one.

Overall, I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting New York. Not only are the prices INCREDIBLE for the experience, but the staff, ambiance, and overall vibe are unlike anything I've ever had in the city. Usually, I prepare for my expectations to not be met, but at Ace Hotel, my expectations were beyond exceeded. Thank you so much for an unforgettable weekend!!!

title: BEST WEEKEND EVER
text: My friends chose this hotel for my bachelorette weekend and it was honestly the perfect choice!! The location is fantastic—we had a lot of bags for all our outfits and it was just a quick walk from penn station so that was perfect. Since it’s in such a central spot it was so easy to use it as a home base to go to each restaurant, museum, bar and club that my friends made reservations for (and they were all over). The room itself was STUNNING. It was super clean and the bed was so comfortable my sister and I slept like babies. I literally was FaceTiming my fiancé and my parents to give them tours of the room because we were all in love with it. I love that the lobby had security since we were a group of girls coming and going so we felt very safe and the lobby area is such a vibe. We got some great pictures down there! 10/10 will recommend staying here to everyone I know it really made the whole weekend so special and I know my friends and I will never forget the memories we made here!

title: Great location, good vibes & friendly staff
text: Great location, amazing staff, good vibes. I can recommend it in a heartbeat. Our room was on the 4th floor so it was a bit dark, but we didn’t mind too much. The location is absolutely amazing, we could walk or cycle to anywhere we wanted to visit in under 40 minutes. We’ll definitely stay here again when we’re back in NYC

title: Bachelorette Party stay
text:
This is my 2nd stay at Ace New York and this time, for a Bachelorette party. The rooms were amazing - we had two connecting rooms: a Double Bed and a Loft, which worked perfectly with a large group. The Loft was also the perfect space to have a party/gathering and fun to decorate.
The hotel itself is also in a great area and within walking distance to all of the restaurants/clubs/activities we needed to get to - which was helpful with getting cabs/Ubers because of the rain.

title: Better than the "BIG BOX" Hotels
text: This was my second stay at this location. I returned because I loved it so much the first time. It's got a great vibe, excellent lounge and happy hour. Easy to access location, friendly and helpful staff. I love that they elevate the basic and industrial into art. I love the simple made interesting-- for example the reenforced glass and the vintage fridge.

title: My home away from home in NYC
text: The pre-checkin made things very quick when we officially checked in and the desk staff was helpful and friendly. We had a clean, comfortable, relaxing stay, and I love the interior design of the hotel. The Ace Hotel is in a perfect location; it is easy for us to get around the city. Wonderful staff and accommodations!

title: Great hotel, great location.
text: Loved the atmosphere, very lively especially around happy hour which was in fact 3 hours. I appreciate it may not be for some but I loved it. The staff were all so very friendly and helpful. The views of the Empire State building from the 11th floor were great.

title: Ace Hotel was WONDERFUL & Li Tang is an amazing manager!
text: Ace Hotel is AMAZING!  Li Tang is an incredible manager & helped us on my daughters wedding day. .. food was delicious, Room terrific, people were friendly and service could not be matched.  Definitely stay here!

title: A great trip
text: Let me just start off saying that the hotel is beautiful and has a very New York style feel. The room was awesome and the services was amazing! I would refer anyone to this place! And when I come back this is where I’ll be staying for sure!

title: Very welcoming check in
text: Thank you OSAYE for helping me with a seamless check in!! Very friendly and helped guide me throughout the hotel. Looking forward to coming back. Also love the bar downstairs for a drink! Bartenders are really nice

title: Setting the bar
text: This was my second stay at an Ace Hotel and the legacy of cool continues. From unique design details and interesting art to spaces that inspire and welcome. The staff was stellar with a warm welcome and willingness to go above and beyond - providing bandages for heels to rando toiletries to save the day, literally. Our room was stocked with cozy hooded sweatshirt robes and thoughtfully scented lotion, etc.  Between Stumptown for coffee, Black Seed Bagel to start the day, and Milk Bar for indulgences - the accessibility factor hit all the marks. This was our son’s (age 11) first time in NYC and he loved the deejay spinning beats on a Saturday night in the lobby, setting the bar pretty high.

title: Great hotel in Midtown!
text:
This is a very nice hotel in midtown Manhattan. I was easily able to walk there from Moynihan train station. The room was fantastic--clean, very comfortable bedd, lots of dimmable lamps, great water pressure in the shower. Staff was friendly and even offered to store my luggage when I checked out. The location is very convenient--I was able to walk to Central Park, Broadway show, Chelsea Market and the Highline, and a comedy club. 
My room was right across the hall from the elevator and I was afraid it would be noisy.  Not at all--didn't hear anything.

title: Best service in the Industry- ACE Hotel NYC
text: As soon as I arrived I was so warmly greeted by Michale at the guest services center.  After having travelled solo my first time to NYC I was so happy to see such a calm smiling face.  I felt immediately safe and comfortable.  She took care of me like I was family and I so appreciate her.  She deserves 10 stars and a raise.  Thank you so much I will definitely come back again.

title: Where Can I Find an Apartment this Spacious?
text:
A group of us bought four separate rooms of varying sizes.  I gotta say…these guys have the best pillows & mattresses - super comfy sleep every single night after long days out (we were there for four nights).
The staff is friendly and fun.  Special kudos to Front Desk Freddy and Bar Master Anthony, couldn’t have asked for more genuine, proactive and overall great hospitality from those two.  They had us in stitches and truly enjoyed sharing their city with great recommendations.  

The location of this Ace is excellent, walkable to anywhere in Manhattan (if you enjoy exploring on foot). Drinks at Happy Hour were always a great way to start the evening and the food was delicious - we tend to do snacks and breakfast a lot.

All in all, we’ll be back!

title: Great place
text: We had a great time on our trip and our room exceeded expectations. The front desk worker manager, Kodie, was so helpful and kind. We will definitely be back and will stay at this hotel again! I highly recommend

title: Traveled for fun to NYC. Awesome front desk manager.
text: Kodie was such an incredible front desk manager. She fielded all my minute needs and complaints. I just had so many specific preferences and she was a gem in making the experience a win. The hotel was good and met my expectations.

title: Great NYC Hotel!
text: Recently took a trip to NYC with my family and had a wonderful stay here. Great location near everything we wanted to see! The hotel itself was very clean, the staff were all so, so kind and there were so many fun/cute touches all over! Definitely will be recommending to our friends for their next trip to NYC!

title: Perfect hotel for trip to Broadway show!
text: Had the most fabulous stay here! We came in to see Aladdin and this hotel was within walking distance. Our bed was super comfortable, the room was immaculate and the views were so pretty! The drinks in the Lobby were delicious (loved the “Red Flag”). Will definitely stay here again!

title: Hip & Super Comfortable
text: The location was great. Ambiance was super chill and fun. Room was quiet and comfortable. Really nice shower in the bathroom. Great assortment of snacks for in-room purchases and consumption, even a bottle of wine.  Staff was fun and friendly.

title: Always a good idea
text:
Ace is always a good idea. 
Great beds, comfy pillows, clean rooms, attentive staff and a great location. 
Even when I'm traveling for work, it is a stress-free zone, the moment I walk through the doors.

title: Don't hesitate!
text:
Great hotel, trendy with nice atmosphere.
Cosy rooms, nice furniture and good size.
Very comfortable bed and pillows.
Nice mix of old-trendy-chic-fashion.
Very nice smily staff.
Premium location.
Don't hesitate!

title: The Ace is the place!
text: The Ace Hotel on 29th Street has become my new favorite spot. The rooms are cozy (love the specious bathrooms and plentiful toiletries) and my stays have been so easy-breezy. The front desk staff is friendly and available around the clock and they’re so helpful (especially Michelle I., who assisted me with an early check-in recently). Plus, the location is perfect…close to restaurants, grocery stores, retails stores and a few blocks from Penn Station. I will be returning and hope to have more time to enjoy the lobby scene!

title: Ace Hotel on 29th- worth the stay!!
text:
We absolutely loved our stay at the Ace Hotel on 29th. The venue was beautiful, great vibe, super clean, and very conveniently located. Every one of the staff members working had a fantastic attitude and was overly helpful. Michelle at the front desk was especially incredible! She greeted us with a smile
Day 1 and every day after, and was extremely helpful with local recommendations, hotel questions, etc. she went above and beyond all 3 days. We will certainly be back to NYC, and will gladly stay at this hotel again.

title: Family Trip to NYC- loved the ACE Hotel
text: Wow!  What a wonderful stay at the Ace NYC!! I loved the room, the view, the staff!!!  Everything was terrific! From the comfy bed to the soothing shower!  I Was fortunate to get to stay in a loft room- it was fabulous- and so spacious!!! Highly recommend …and the front desk crew were so friendly, and helpful!  Hope to see you again on my next trip to town!!!

title: Perfect Honeymoon!
text:
Came to the Ace for our honeymoon because we love the LA location! 

And speaking of location, it’s perfect! Empire State, 30 Rock, tons of restaurants and late night vibes! The front desk totally hooked us up with a nice room and a sweet view. Thank you so much Jade X & Marco Burroni! We had an unforgettable experience and will be back for our anniversary!!

title: Customer service appreciated!
text:
I am leaving this review for Jade of the front office specifically. I came to her with a package problem at 9am and she was somehow still there when I came back at 7pm. I know she was not here that long for me specifically but she took my information, investigated, followed up with me throughout the day and had an answer when I returned to the hotel. Excellent, efficient, patient and colorful!  

My only con is that its a little noisy on the weekends but this is New York!!!

title: Young, fly & fun!
text:
amazing stay! I had complications with a hotel nearby with a water contamination.

I was honestly skeptical but Osage greeted me with such a warm welcome and I really needed that after the horrible day I had.

Jade the manager checked the water and room out before we went upstairs to ease our minds and made us feel so safe! thank you again to your amazing team. Absolutely disproved the stereotype that New Yorkers are rude. 

There’s also a ton of restaurants in the area, walking distance to many museums, galleries, parks and markets! would absolutely recommend!

title: Weekend with coworkers
text:
Absolutely love the location! Subway is 2 seconds away, rooftop bar at the end of the street with a great DJ! We had a room on the 2nd floor with an ok view but it was quiet!

The reception desk was amazing dealing with a million packages coming in. Jade you are a godsend! Thanks everyone so much for attending to our group during our stay.

title: FREDDY!!! & great ACE Experience
text:
Room 311 was wonderful—SOUL “Tapestry” & a guitar?! Amazing. Love all the fun sayings everywhere. Such a great location for our stay. Very nice gym to use, too. Especially as a Manhattan “local” looking to try new hotel places for future out-of-town visitors. 
 Staff was so Exceptional, especially Front Desk FREDDY! Came through with guitar picks/ toothbrush/Plus Plus—felt SO Taken Care Of!
Also Miguel & Anthony at Lobby Bar, & Roy on Bell/checkout. Thursday MahJong?—I’ll be back.
Can’t wait to maybe try Ace in other Cities <3 
We really came because of how great Freddy IS!!  <3 <3

title: Highly recommend
text: This was my third time staying at Ace Hotel. I lived in NYC almost a decade, and I'm picky about where I stay. Excellent staff, clean rooms, and great location always make this a fantastic stay. Highly recommend this hotel.

title: Central location, but room and lobby are very dark
text: We stayed here for 2 nights. On positive side, it's a central location, room was good-sized, Lobby attracted a young, hip crowd, there's a gym downstairs, and coffee shop, Stumptown, off the lobby. On negative side, lobby was really dark, room (#201) was windowless and very dark, shower drain didn't work well, toilet didn't flush well, and elevator was very small and slow. Definitely adequate. But don't think I'd stay here again.

title: Tanto valeva visitare il polo nord
text:
Non ho mai pensato di visitare il polo nord perché non amo il freddo e non mi piacciono i luoghi poco illuminati. Purtroppo però a luglio mi sono ritrovata a soggiornare all'Ace Hotel di NY! Non ho mai fatto cattive recensioni per una questione di principio e rispetto del lavoro altrui, ma devo fare un'eccezione per mettere in guardia altri ignari turisti che volessero alloggiare lì! Avete letto la Divina Commedia? Vi ricordate il canto nel quale  Dante descrive la zona della Giudecca? Ecco lo potremmo tranquillamente adattare alla hall del nostro albergo. Un freddo glaciale che persino un pinguino si sarebbe messo il cappotto! Così oltre al freddo che ti annebbiava i sensi l'illuminazione era degna di un film dell'horror che rendeva l'ambiente spettacolarmente tetro e sinistro per fare un paragone, molto meno illustre, ma sempre chiarificatore, sembrava di essere sul set di  "Nosferatu" edizione 1922. 
Le camere? Piccole, con una forzata ambientazione anni 60/70 molto vintage,  poco comode e molto radical chic! Quindi se scegli lo stesso l'Ace hotel e non ti prendi una polmonite per  freddo non ti fratturi qualcosa cadendo per il buio e se riesci a dormire in una tana potrai visitare NY che rimane pur sempre un città unica!

title: Un hôtel de caractère, raffiné et accueillant
text:
L'hôtel est top ! L'ambiance chaleureuse, le design étudié, le staff accueillant, l'emplacement central ont fait de notre séjour une grande réussite. Toutes nos demandes ont gentiment été satisfaites, encore merci !
Nous reviendrons :)

title: Great vibes at Ace Hotel!
text: Had an awesome time at the Ace Hotel this summer. Rooms are nice and clean and housekeeping is there daily to inquire about your needs. The bar staff was also very friendly. Jade was also super helpful. Our flight was canceled and she was quickly able to extend our stay without any hassle. Would recommend this hotel to friends.

title: Great Customer Service!
text: Ace hotel is in a wonderful location! Close to the train station, and tons of things to do within a walkable distance! The rooms were clean and room service stopped by daily to check in on any needs for our room! Jade at the front desk was very helpful with directions and recommendations on where to go eat near the hotel! The lobby had great music and provided an area to enjoy and have drinks! There is also a great cafe attached to the hotel!

title: Great experience at Ace Hotel!
text: We had a wonderful stay at the Ace Hotel NY! It is in a wonderful central location with many restaurants and sight seeing around the hotel. The rooms are very clean and comfortable, and the lobby/bar is a lively area and fun spot to hang out before the night ends! The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful, especially Jade who gave us tips on restaurants and areas to visit during our time in NYC! She was helpful in accommodating us as well when our flight was canceled and we needed an additional night stay. We had a great experience at Ace and would stay again!

title: Recommended stay for your next NYC trip
text:
Great location near train stations, as well as very walkable - we were able to get downtown or uptown in less than 30 minutes.  
We had a very comfortable stay for the whole family, with plenty of room in the large double room we got.  Every staff member we encountered was friendly and professional.  Added bonus is that this location has the flagship Milk Bar downstairs.

title: Great hotel, great price for nyc
text: Love this hotel. The beds are great and the staff is friendly and helpful. The location can’t be beat - and there’s always a lively scene in the lobby in a good way. The hotel is kept very clean, which seems to be hard to find these days. I’d highly recommend staying here- the price is right and you won’t feel like you are missing out on any amenities.

title: Great location, cool vibe, friendly service!
text: This hotel hit all the right cords!  The location is great close to trains and walkable.  The staff is friendly and extremely helpful.  The vibe in the lobby is unique and inviting.  I would stay here again for sure.  The rooms are comfortable, very clean, and not to mention super cute!  This place is great!

title: Trendy & Vibrant Atmosphere
text: The Ace Hotel offers a trendy and vibrant atmosphere, characterized by its hipster aesthetic and artistic ambiance. My wife and I had an unforgettable experience at this jaw dropper of a hotel. The hotel's industrial-chic design and eclectic decor attract a young and creative crowd. With its central location in Manhattan, it provides easy access to various attractions. Overall, the Ace Hotel NY is a great choice for those seeking a unique and lively stay in the heart of the city.

title: A great stay!!!
text:
A great stay with surprisingly large rooms for your typical NY hotel. 
The bathroom looked fabulous and the showers were great after long days walking round Manhattan. 
The room was very comfortable.
The lobby was fabulous with great music. 
The staff were very friendly and really helpful with any questions we had. Thanks Ace Hotel for a great stay. We’d love to come back again soon.

title: Best Staycaytion!!
text:
This spot has a cool, rock & roll feel without out being too much. Boutique hotel but not snooty. Loved the Lobby Bar. Osage totally took care of us. He was warm & very welcoming. He set us up with a corner room on the 10th Floor. I highly recommend getting a higher floor if you can.  Jesus was also very helpful too with great restaurant recs.

Highlights (in no particular order) :
1. Great captian's bed & quality bedding.
2. The shower pressure was strong.
3.  Friendly & helpful staff.
4. Close to all the action.
5. Free fancy toiletries. 

Nomad is a great part of town if you want delicious food & fun stuff to look at.  Koloman is a delicious Austrian/French restaurant for dinner & brunch. Stumptown coffee is literally next door. Milk Bar-such a sweet tooth's dream. They even have a barber shop & a fancy perfume shop on the same street. Can hardly wait to come back! It was such a treat!

title: Great spot!
text: Great location. Cool place with comfy, well-appointed rooms. Warm, welcoming staff. Hip, great building with cool interior design. Tons of great restaurants within walking distance. Subway, MSG and train station easy walks. Will definitely return!

title: The Ace Hotel ROCKS!!!
text: The Ace is a wonderful hotel, with a real playful sense, combined with the most helpful and courteous staff that you will be lucky to find even in a 5 star property. Although my room was quite small, it  was "cure and cozy" and the bed was soooh comfortable. Great coffee place next to the entrance; fabulous restaurants, cafes and bars line the streets rof the Flatiron District -- the most "happening" and lively section of Manhattan. The lobby is wonderful, with library reading-room style desks for working. I cannot recommend this hotel more highly!

title: Horrible
text: My reservation was not honored!  I got my corporate travel agent and Expedia on the phone to confirm I had a valid reservation, yet the hotel would still not honor. When I asked what they'd recommend, they offered me a rate that was 40% higher than what was confirmed in writing with record locators and advertised the day prior. When questioned on why travel agent, expedia and me all have a valid, active reservation and only Ace did not, they offered no explanation. Not only is this establishment shifty and untrustworthy, they lack basic humanity and empathy. Seek hospitality elsewhere.

title: Phenomenal hotel in the perfect location
text: Phenomenal hotel in the perfect location. The staff was super helpful, shout out to Jade for assisting us. The room and Lobby were perfect for working remotely. The drinks at the bar were perfect. Stayed at other Ace hotels before and they never disappoint.

title: Great bar for business travellers
text: Great bar that had an excellent DJ night I was there. The kind of bar you can retreat to with your laptop if you are in from out of town on business. Room had everything I needed, including iron and ironing board. Overall experience was great, who cares about the small stuff.

title: great two night stay in NYC
text: one of the most spacious and nicest rooms in new york city i've ever stayed at!! it was really spacious (a full smeg fridge, nice bathroom, dining table, desk setup w/record player and records, ac unit, queen bed) and the view was gorgeous outside the window. we had north facing windows and it was stunning. the staff was all really great, and when i told them our TV wasn't working, they were very helpful.

title: Loved it!
text: Great staff and great stay! The room had a fun aesthetic and was very clean! We also got a free drink and a free coffee and pastry from the hotel and that was much appreciated! The bar staff in the lobby was very nice as well

title: Great hotel, better people
text:
I stayed at the Ace for a work trip a week ago. It’s about ten blocks south of my office, which is great because it means I get to see a bit more than just the 5 blocks around my office while I'm there. PLUS, there are better restaurants in and around the Ace Hotel. 

On this trip I had a couple room issues because of noisy pipes that wouldn't quit, I ended up needing to switch rooms but the staff at the Ace were so great and I felt taken care of the whole way. Through my stay Jade, Matt and Osage all helped me out and made sure that I got set up with a new room so I could get a good night's sleep (and I absolutely did, since the beds and pillows are some of the most comfortable I’ve slept on). They truly made all the difference. Thanks again to Osage, Matt and Jade for being so kind, accommodating and helpful! Would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Unequivocally cool, good value, showing some wear & tear
text:
- premium feeling in the lobby, fun energy 
- good value for money vs other hotels at this price point
- rooms are thoughtfully furnished (ample plugs, lights with dimmers, curated mini bar)
- showing wear & tear: rooms could use a facelift as bathrooms are cracking and carpet is worn
- a+ for safety: both deadbolt and chain on the doors, staff is careful to write instead of say your room #, etc.
- comfy bed, linens and pillows
- good location for getting around the city + for business meetings 
- no more le labo shower supplies in July ‘23
