It feels like you’re staying at your cool musician cousin’s apartment in Brooklyn. It may not be perfectly polished, but there’s a very fun vibe.

title: Amazing stays at the Ace
text: My friend and I went for a long weekend NYC trip before Independence Day. We stayed in a bunk room for an experience. The room was tidy and clean, the bed was very comfortable. Every night when we are back to the hotel, our room had been tidied up and the towels had been changed to clean ones. The Ace staffs were super friendly and helpful. On the last day of staying, I thought I lost my passport, the reception staff, the cleaning team & the AC Engineer were all trying to help me find it, and it turned out it was my mistake to put my passport at the super hidden spot in my luggage that I couldn't notice. Big shout out to all the staff at the Ace, it was a pleasure to stay at the Ace Hotel. Will definitely come back next time.

title: A great pied a terre in the Big Apple
text: Our stay at this hotel was summed up by the service we received from Jesus (outstanding!), Julio and Freddie (man, does this guy now how to decorate his tie!). Jesus was willing and able to accommodate our extended stay in New York. He went over and beyond and REALLY looked after my family and I. I would stay there again, because of him - the people are what make this hotel. The mixologist was great and the vibe really evokes the excitement felt in the Great Gatsby. Thanks, Jesus, for the great room!! We heart you brother! ;)

title: Great stay in the Big Apple
text: Chic, eclectic, super comfy hotel in the heart of Midtown. Our room was impressive with a great view, super quiet even with traffic outside, wonderful furnishings, great bathroom, and the bed was amazing. Got the best night sleep of my life! The bar and coffee shop downstairs are added perks, the staff was incredible and it's easy walking distance to everything we wanted to see and do. Highly recommend.

title: Freddie was amazing!
text: Have stayed here many times but this was our first with a special request.  Our twins 16th birthday in New York City.  Freddie was amazing! He was a big help arranging some special surprises for our kids 16th birthday in the Big Apple.  Hospitality at its finest. 👊

title: Great customer service!
text: Freddy who works at the front desk was amazing!  He was very kind, accommodating, patient, and was diligent in finding solutions for all of my needs. Give that man a raise! The hotel is conveniently located to union square and the subway.

title: Guidelines for staying at Ace NY
text:
Follow these steps for a shower:
1)  Turn on water, get wet
2)  Turn off water before you are submerged in your own filth
3)  Lather
4)  Turn on water, rinse quickly
5)  Tell front desk your drain is barely doing so
6)  Repeat for 2 more days

Follow these options for sleeping in summer:
1)  Bring earplugs since the AC is louder than any you've experienced
2)  Turn off AC and marinate all night in your own sweat.

To see in this dark hotel:
-Flashlights for lobby
-An extra lamp for room

And get to pay a $35 a night destination fee for all this.  Hunting their site this is for the fitness center (I pay $10 a month for mine that is a gazillion times bigger), Internet (despite it being unsecure, don't use unsecure WiFi) (despite a gazillon hotels not charging for WiFi) and phone calls (since no one carries a phone with them)

title: Meh…
text: Was hoping for more. Great location to several shops/dining and areas of town. Lobby was hip but so dark and so LOUD. Music at night out of control loud. Had to leave after attempting to get a drink. Room was large but the A/C stunk, room was damp and was musty. Bathroom was odd, bathtub never drained and small sink area. SMEG fridge full of drinks/snacks that were over the top expensive (water box $9). Felt like I was living in someone’s basement for a few days. Gym very small and hot. No ventilation.  Coffee/breakfast service in the am was ok but why spend hotel prices (breakfast sandwich $21) when you can walk 5 min for a better breakfast?  Overall…meh. Probably won’t be back for the price.

title: Great stay
text: Me and my friends stayed here for three nights. We had a great time with a clean room and comfortable beds. I would recommend spending time in the nice and fun lobby, especially in the evenings. Very helpful staff. Recommend staying!

title: Go-to hotel when I’m in NY
text: I’ve stayed here a few times, including for fun and work travel. Great experience overall. Love the lobby area and coffee shop. Impressed with the rooms I’ve stayed in, except the smallest type of room wasn’t the best. My most recent stay included a really positive customer experience with Freddy and Jade at the front desk. They were both wonderful. In general, the service here is very accommodating and friendly. Highly recommend and will stay there again

title: Our fam loved it and will be back soon!
text:
My husband, parents and I enjoyed our stay in the Deluxe room with two double beds for three nights (we were on the 9th floor). The beds were incredibly comfy, and we were able to sleep peacefully, especially my dad. The front desk staff were exceptional, friendly, and welcoming. Since we arrived earlier than expected, we were able to leave our luggage with them, and felt safe as they provided another for us to identify our room number/name.

The location is def 100 out of 100. The hotel lobby was lovely and had a chill vibe, with a restaurant, bar, and photo booth. There was also a coffee shop and dessert shop right next to it, which was convenient when waiting for others or a cab. The hotel’s location is perfect, with easy access to the subway and felt safe to walk around, even at midnight, with bright lights and many people around. Plus, our room had a beautiful view of the Empire State Building. 

There were many delicious restaurants nearby, including brunch, lunch, and Asian food options, making our stay even more enjoyable. We will definitely go back to this hotel soon.

title: Best of NYC
text: Absolute best hotel in NYC, staff is beyond wonderful, the building and design is gorgeous and the prices are always great. Matt in Reception is fantastic and super appreciate David for making sure my stay was extra special. Best of NYC !!

title: Singular Experience
text:
This trip was a combination business and pleasure and, once again, Ace Hotel looks for reasons to say 'yes' when they can.
We asked for early check-in since we have tickets for The Met and pre show dinner reservations following a 3 hour drive into the city.

Kodie from the Front Desk team was responsive and helpful even before it was possible to solve this problem (the night prior when they cannot know when/if rooms will be ready early) . 

She also honored a 3rd party booking site rate when I would have paid more for the convenience of early check-in. 

Following our email exchange I got a response from a different upscale boutique hotel offering early check-in and a lower rate than Ace but we opted to stay here. 

We're always glad we did. Check-in and parking were fast and painless and with ample time to relax and prepare for the evening,which makes all the difference. 
The rooms are all different but each with a curated space and the hotel with an alluring film noir vibe. 
We've just booked again for our big anniversary weekend in July. We'll write an updated review afterwards. We know it will be perfect which is why we chose Ace to celebrate.

title: Will keep coming back!
text: Had a wonderful stay here. Freddy was AMAZING. He saw that I had booked a slight smaller room for my mum and I, and, he was gracious enough to upgrade us. He couldn’t have known but this was my moms first trip after being sick. He made it extra special! The room itself was wonderful and amenities were great. This was my second stay here and I’ll always come back. location is very convenient and the bar downstairs is wonderful.

title: Ace with the Family.
text: Ace is ace! Very comfortable and close to everything. Freddy is cool af, checked us in and gave us the warm welcome. Rooms were efficient and beds were clouds. 1st floor has everything you need for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and dessert. Will def be back.

title: Amazing Stay!
text: Incredible experience at the NYC Ace Hotel! Freddy and Kodie went above and beyond to make sure we had a comfortable stay, we will definitely be coming back. Great environment in the lobby with space to work

title: Another wonderful stay at the Ace NYC
text: I am a returning visitor to the Ace NYC hotel. I am always excited to come back as the feeling is like you came back home. Personal attention and great vibe combined with best location for me make this hotel ideal . David the director for rooms has a real talent to make the guests feel welcomed.

title: 10/10 recommend
text: Super great staff, very helpful and attentive. The lobby and bar had such a great vibe and room was perfect! The location was also great. Honestly zero compliments- would recommend over any other place in New York!

title: great experience
text: Great stay at Ace! Check in was a breeze. The agent Matt was very nice and helpful. He recommended a great restaurant in the area we loved! We look forward to our next visit and would definitely book again.

title: Great vibe
text: We had a blast.  Loved the hotel, the staff and the location.  The king room was big and extremely comfortable.  The bed was great, the sheets soft, the bathroom big.  We loved the location, and the in house coffee shop.  Around the corner was a great bagel place and restaurants all within walking distance.  Already making plans to go back.

title: A place to enjoy ! very original and wonderful stay
text: high degree of creativity and originality. Wonderful rooms, great view, great food, nice lobby, kindness services. each detail is made to make your experience as wonderful as possible. i will recommend Ace hotel to all my friends.

title: Really recommend
text: Really enjoyed my stay here. Perfect location, very nice room and the staff was extremely friendly, especially Freddy at the front desk. It was clean and the ac worked perfectly and I had zero complaints. The bed was so so comfy and the pillows perfect. It’s a big city though so bring earplugs.

title: Freddy was fantastic!
text: I got to the ace a bit early, and was met by Freddy at the front desk. Unexpectedly Freddy upgraded my room, which was very thoughtful… He was so polite and efficient… And I’m not just saying that because he upgraded me. I was greeted by him on my departure as well. The entire staff at the ace hotel is delightful… I was just lucky enough to have Freddy meet all of my needs… A lovely stay!  Thank you Freddy!

title: Witty Fun
text: I have now stayed more than 50 times at the Ace on 29th and Broadway in Manhattan. I guess I must really like it and I do. It fits really well to my predilection for art. I love gallery going and this hotel is well placed for access to the Chelsea gallery district. The hotel itself is a work of art. It has a witty side too with stenciled sayings on the walls everywhere. Speaking of walls, the rooms I've been in each have paintings on the walls, the most recent was a flock of blackbirds. Many of the rooms have a guitar and a turntable with vinyl to play. The restaurant off the lobby is new. I had a very good meal there on my recent stay. Try it!

title: Always a pleasure
text: Very friendly staff, nice vibe and very nice and functional rooms. The lobby has a good crowd, very social. They thought of everything, the room is fully stocked with snacks and drinks for those late night cravings and the robes are luxe! Very clean, I felt like home.

title: Comfortable & Stylish
text: I enjoyed my stay at the Ace Hotel New York! I requested and received a quiet room that faced the back of the building. My room was spacious for a NYC hotel, and well-appointed. The front desk staff was extremely friendly, and it seemed like they genuinely cared that I had a good stay. I would stay at this hotel again, for sure!

title: The Ace Hotel is a NY gem
text:
Once again, my favorite hotel, Ace Hotel New York did not disappoint. I have been going to this hotel for years and the service has been consistent. Not only is it in a great location, it's fun to hang out there. The front desk staff is stellar: special shoutouts to Osage, Marco, Ray, Jesus, Vodie, Freddy and Julio.

And they really take care of their repeat customers. My husband and I were delighted to be surprise upgraded to a beautiful loft room that felt like an apartment. 

We look forward to our NY homecoming next month. Thanks Ace!

title: Better and better!
text:
After moving from NYC I try to come back to visit once or twice a year, and this is my second stay at the Ace. There are a lot of cool hotels in Manhattan, and the Ace certainly fits that bill. The rooms are well kept and it’s a great location whether you want to go to Midtown or downtown. But what really sets it apart is the service. Hotel Manager David helped me out last time I stayed, and left me a “welcome back” gift in my room this time! Everyone I encountered there has been so friendly and helpful. 

On my trips back to visit my old stomping grounds and old friends, my stay at the Ace has become something I look forward to as much as the rest.

title: The Best.......
text:
I've stayed in many hotels over the years, generally speaking you get what you pay for and I dont feel enthused to write a review but this hotel........
From the moment we walked in, you just got a sense of it being somewhere special; the decor, the lighting and bar just oozing taste and coolness personified. In many places that would come with a level of protentiosness, not here, not at all.  The team on the desk were super friendly and welcoming (as were all the staff as we discovered), got us checked in quick and up to our room.
The room itself was clean, spacious and quirky. I loved the record player and guitar particularly! A well stocked mini bar with plenty of room available to put in your own drinks (a full size SMEG actually!), great TV you could link and stream from your own device with uncomplicated ease. The view from the room was an unobstructed picture frame of the top of The Empire State Building, beutifully lit up on an evening.
With a bar that had a good selection of drinks; cocktails, beer and wines that were obviously  carefully chosen and a coffee bar for the morning after we'd enjoyed as many as we dare. I genuinly have nothing negative to say, as a collective experience, it was the best hotel I ever stayed in, and I don't say that lightly.
Thanks to everyone who works at The ACE who made the stay so special, we'll see you again soon.

title: Short Visit
text:
Nice vibe. I’m uncool  but this hotel makes me feel like one of the cool kids 😂
Beautiful lobby.
Great location in NoMad. within walking distance to many places to eat, nice walking distance to the Highline, close to my office.
Good-sized room.

title: Queer weekend getaway
text: I had a great stay back in March with my girlfriend. It was our first time back in NYC post pandemic and Kodie at the front desk gave us some amazing queer bar recommendations & had the scoop with the best vegetarian restaurants. Definitely would stay again, the room was gorgeous and the staff will keep us coming back.

title: De heerlijke vibe van NY gaat door in het hotel!
text:
Wat een heerlijk hotel op een top, top locatie!
We hebben vanuit Ace alles kunnen lopen.
Fijn dat het vlak bij Pen station zit. Je kunt dus met het openbaar vervoer, met 1 keer overstappen van metro naar trein, naar het vliegveld.
De entree met lichtjes en veel planten leidt naar de lobby met een heerlijke vibe met goede muziek waar wordt gewerkt, geborreld etc.
Eenmaal op je kamer merk je niets meer van deze bruisende energie. De kamer is heerlijk rustig. Wij hadden een lekkere, ruime familiekamer. Fijne bedden met veel kussens. 
Na een dag door NY gesjouwd te hebben was het heerlijk "thuiskomen" in het hotel.
Naast het hotel heb je een goede koffiezaak, Milk (voor lekkere koekjes) en een juice-bar waar wij iedere ochtend onze dag gezond begonnen met een vers geperst sapje.
Vriendelijk personeel dat denkt in mogelijkheden
Dank Ace hotel voor een geweldige week!

title: A vibe vibe vibe. Book it, you wont regret it.
text:
Freddy is the MVP. We had a full bonding experience when I had to rush back to hotel because I left a ring in the safe. He was rooting for me! You had to be there haha. He helped with anything I needed and was so nice. 

But this hotel is amazing and such a vibe. I had the king room and it was huge. Beautiful view of Empire State Building from it too! This place attracts a cool crowd, but don’t let it deter you if you don’t think the rock and roll vibe is for you. The details that were thought out in the rooms are insane, it’s an experience being here! 

Only complaint is the gym could be 10000x better, they should really redo it.

title: New York’s most chill stay
text: The entire crew was very helpful and kind! Freddy was an amazing front desk guy! Very fun atmosphere. Love it! Coming back for sure. They have a coffee shop that is accessible thru the lobby. And the milk! Is also accessible thru the other side of the lobby. Along a juice bar. So many things available to anyones craving.

title: If it wasn’t for Freddy..
text: Honestly, if it weren’t for the staff I would have rated this much lower. Truth is ace like most hotels are struggling to keep up with maintenance. I was in nYC for a little over a week and stayed at the ace. The carpets need to be cleaned and replaced, the lighting is hard on your eyes (especially those of us on the screens the last couple of years) and the tv and speaker had problems almost everyday. But Freddy was the light in the storm. He works at the front desk and was ever accommodating we walked thru alternative rooms for cleaner carpeting, fixed my tv everyday, brought up additional lamps so I could see and even switched out my records so I could listen to Nina Simone. If he wasn’t there I would have changed hotels. Thanks so much Freddy! You made it work. You deserve a raise.

title: Baby and Daddy’s Wonderful First Time in New York
text:
I was nervous about going to New York for the first time especially with our one your old. The staff went above and beyond to make everything work out wonderfully.  They let us check in early for nap time and somehow already had the crib ready for us when we got up there.  Freddy at the front desk was so helpful at check in and again at check out.  

The location is right by the subway and so many good restaurants.  We had a great time exploring and tasting and so did our baby / toddler.

title: The Ace Hotel is Aces!
text: Location, location, location.  The Ace Hotel is literally near everything.  The rooms are small but very comfortable.  The general atmosphere is techno-cool but our stay was highlighted by the friendly and very helpful Freddie who really went out of his way to make sure our stay was memorable.  Will definitely stay at the Ace again the next time we visit New York!

title: Unique hotel with friendly staff
text:
The Hotel is great, original and super central! Step away from the empire state building and lots of great restaurants and coffee shops.
The lobby has great music on weekends and delicious drinks.
The staff was super friendly and helpful, especially Freddy at reception :-)

title: AWESOME HOTEL
text: It’s basically in the Heart of the City! A dope hotel. You walk into a lobby that’s super retro. The Staff at the front desk was very polite and helpful. The drinks at the bar are top notch. The room has a retro old school feel which I love. I would definitely recommend this place. Additionally, the bed was Amazing, super comfortable soft but firm enough that I did not wake up with extreme lower back pain. I will definitely be going back there.

title: Solid choice in NYC
text: Ace Hotel has a great vibe.  Front desk was friendly & helpful.  Room decor was spot on: bed comfortable; shower incredible; quiet for a restful night's sleep.  And the lobby is a good place to hang-out too.  Will definitely stay here again,

title: the place to stay in NY
text: We just loved everything about this hotel, the room, the view of the Empire State, the duvet, the furniture, the guitar, the Smeg fridge, the turntables including records, the people, the service, the lobby, the bar!

title: a gem in the heart of the city!!
text: I stayed a week at the Ace Hotel, it was a fantastic experience, a very trendy and fashionable environment, the room was fantastic with its details, perfectly clean, the reception staff were fantastic (special thanks to Jesus who helped with Broadway show tickets), the main lobby is the beating heart of the hotel where you can enjoy excellent cocktails, a stylish pleasant place that makes you feel like a real New Yorker, the location is fantastic and safe, you can explore everything easily, I have stayed in many hotels in New York but Ace hotel is definitively the best place to stay and feel part of this magical city

title: Vista pazzesca!
text:
Un viaggio da sogno reso speciale grazie all’Ace Hotel!
Staff fantastico, sempre disponibile, camere confortevoli e dallo stile unico ma soprattutto vista fantastica sul maestoso Empire!
Posizione centrale, letto comodo, pulizia eccellente !
Tornerei volentieri!

title: We'll be back!
text: Such a fabulous experience at the Ace New York--Rudy & his team, and everyone else we interacted with, from the coffee bar to the bellman to the security + staff, were so lovely. The rooms were beautiful and comfortable + the location is perfect. Until next time!

title: Good Location, Nice Room, Nice View.
text:
Fun hotel with a lobby that always has something going on. Just like the rest of the Ace Hotels.

My room was really nice on a high floor and had a fantastic view of the Empire State building and the room had some fun amenities in it.

title: Easy stay in central Manhattan
text: Always love staying at an Ace Hotel property and this New York location was no exception. Centrally located in Manhattan, aesthetic lobby and rooms, and excellent service. Big thank you to Kodie who helped us transfer rooms after we discovered a late night maintenance issue.

title: Great bar area for lounging!
text: Lovely rooms, very spacious.  Great bar area to lounge with friends,   great location for walking to Broadway/Grand Central, Brooklyn in general.  Friends flew in from London for the theatre and were very impressed.

title: Vibes
text: Excellent cafe - super vibe. Wonderful rooms. Perfect location. Staff were really helpful. So well located. Just a few steps to Broadway. The nearest Subway station is just around the corner. A little expensive but you won't regret it.

title: GREAT Hotel in every regard
text:
Great location, great staff, great rooms, great vibe, great food & drinks, great price...

I travel to NYC for work a few times per month and was getting tired of the big family of hotels I was always staying with. Ace looked great from the marketing but the price made me wonder if it was legit. I took a chance and now without exaggeration, it's the only hotel I'll stay at going forward.

title: amazing and  unforgettable
text: Had such an amazing time. Great staff and amazing room and the bathtub was amazing !! Me and my wife went to grab a drink and felt the vibes. After a few drinks we were ready to enjoy our room and well it was AMAZING.

title: Awesome stay in NYC!
text:
The Ace Hotel NY is the perfect place to stay for anyone looking for a unique and trendy experience in NY. The lobby is an excellent place to work during the day, with  good wifi, and plenty of space to spread out and get things done.

My favorite thing about staying here is that each room comes with a hotel guitar, which is perfect for any musician who can't travel with their instrument and uses music to de - stress

The lobby bar is a great first or last visit spot for the night.

It's got everything you need and more, and I can't wait to go back.

title: Excelente servicio y hotel impecable!
text: Mi esposo y yo disfrutamos mucho la estadia en este hotel. La atencion fue muy buena y el hotel muy limpio. Quiero decirles que Julio nos dio buena atencion y nos dio recomendaciones de diferentes restaurantes y area de entretenimiento. Definitivamente recomiendo el hotel a Julio!

title: Un hotel muy NY
text:
8 noches en NY en ACE Hotel New York.
Todo han sido facilidades. Servicio excelente e inmejorable ubicación a una calle del metro.
Una experiencia fantástica en un hotel muy auténtico y con un lobby donde siempre pasan cosas!!

title: Amazing room/view + amazing hotel lobby + wonderful overall experience
text: Absolutely loved our time and Julio at the front desk was amazing!! Milton our taxi driver shuffled us around NYC and the lobby bar was always hoppin! Met a lot of tourists and locals and had a blast!

title: Ace Downtown is great
text:
I enjoy Ace Hotel, it’s more like staying with friends than a hotel chain. Staff are great, shoutout Rudy & Rory who helped us out with equipment cases. 

The neighborhood has such a rich history, you can basically Google any address and get an instant glimpse of NYC lore

title: Happy guests!! :)
text: Super nice hotel! Great friendly staff like Freddy and Matt. They made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. Loved the mood in the lobby too- nice trendy spot to have a romantic cocktail. And perfect location!!!

title: In love with Ace
text: Best of Nomad: wonderful welcoming and caring staff very clean perfect location with great quick access to subways and lots of great restaurants at your footsteps. I have been coming for years and still am in love with Ace New York xo

title: This team is top notch !
text: Went just this past week and the hotel front desk team is top notch. From the moment I arrived to when I left they were very hospitable and accommodating. Freddy was the attendant that assisted my group and I coming in. From checking us in, to receiving our luggage and storing them, and even explaining about the early check in procedure, he was on point. Great energy and I would definitely come back for business or even personal leisure.

title: Ask for Freddy!
text:
At first we were a bit skeptical.. it was a new hotel our company was trying out for a week of executive meetings.. executives were flown in from as close as Canada to as far as Singapore.. AND WE WERE ALLLLL BLOWN AWAY by your Front Desk Agent Freddy!!! 

All of our executives were treated with the highest levels of customer service and care throughout the entire week. 

Yes, the rooms were unique and your Lobby has a magical energy, but we all agree FREDDY was the best part. We even brought him up in our sales meeting calling out his consistency! 

He took such care to be certain we went to the best places in NYC, based on the atmosphere and corporate connections we were looking for, he was better than any concierge service we have used in NY. 

In addition, he took great care to check on us and make certain all of our rooms were up to our standards. We all travel extensively in our roles and that is why we had to take time to acknowledge his professionalism charisma and charm. 

We were shocked to discover he was not yet in a management role? Perhaps this call out will have you all take a second look. 

Thank you!

title: Real treat
text: Amazing experience courtesy of the Ace Hotel team.  Stunning hotel with lots of nods to its past, the coolest bathrobes ( which you can buy in their shop if you love them as much as I did),! Very comfortable rooms with lovely details. If you are coming to New York to explore you can’t ask for better location- you are literally 10-15 mins walk to most places you might want to see. Great eateries all around, shops and bars within minutes walk and you have great coffee shop and cookie shop and juice bar and bagel bar all within the hotel. If you had any doubts - don’t. It’s like a Soho house with more affordable price tag :-) I will be certainly returning !

title: Loved the Ace Hotel
text: First time staying at the Ace Hotel in Manhattan and we loved everything about it. Spacious, clean and stylish room with a huge fridge, round table for working as well as takeout dinners and well-appointed bathroom. Staff was lovely… shout out to Freddy who was kind enough to offer us a late checkout which helped us out on a rainy/snowy morning.

title: The Ace never disappoints
text:
You can always count on the Ace hotel group to choose a great location in every city they plop themselves in. New York is no exception! 
As per all Ace hotels the New York location has a very hip inviting vibe 
The lounge/bar is buzzing and inclusive yet private if you prefer. 
The lounge bar offers great coffee and a menu perfect for chilling or a quick bite before heading out. 
The yogurt and fresh fruit 👏
Adjoining the  lounge is an amazing restaurant Brunch and dinner were delicious !! Through 2 other lounge doors you can find an amazing juice bar and the famous stumptown coffee. 
The staff is always friendly.  The rooms are signature hip and always extremely clean. 
It's a hotel for all age groups that appreciate details 
Another perk of this location is that the restaurant Ilili is literally around the corner. My favourite restaurant in New York. Best Brussel sproats ever.

title: Plenty adequate or better than that
text:
A fun, rather hip place - even if it perhaps tries a little too hard in that latter vein. The bed was very comfortable and the room decent-sized, especially by Manhattan standards. 

Of course, it was overpriced, but welcome to NYC. The bar in the lobby is very loud so be sure to ask for an upper floor. We were on the 8th floor and it was plenty quiet. The hallway smelled like mothballs, but our room was fine. 

Not five stars, but totally acceptable given the still inflated price point.

title: Amazing!!
text:
First freddy julio roy or ruddy , all the ones at front desk. They all helped us. All were gentle and tried  and done make us feel we were not alone in the big city. The room.amazing at tenth floor. Super cleaned evety day. Honest peaple all
We ll be back because of the love we received.

title: LOVE THIS PLACE
text: OMG!! I love this place. I can't wait to come and stay here again. The location is great. The bar, restaurant and coffee station makes the whole stay wonderful. It's really a perfect spot to stay in and the rates are so reasonable. We just absolutely loved it. I went for a business trip but will definitely stay here again soon when we come to visit NYC for entertainment.

title: Ace Hotel in Flatiron and Great Staff -Freddy - 100% stay
text:
Having been a few times and always enjoying the space..this last visit was the best! I received the most professional and warm service from Freddy. He works the front desk during the day. Truly pleasant to chat with him about the hotel and the time he’s been there…went above and beyond, very accommodating. 
Also love that new and old businesses are opening up again. Pricey neighborhood but a fun experience overall!

title: Lovely hotel experience!
text: I stay at the Ace all the time, mostly because of the staff. They are what makes the Ace the Ace. We all know it could use a little refresh but the energy that the staff puts off is unmatched. It had been a long time since I had been back due to COVID and Kodie hooked me up with a great room! Was overall a wonderful experience. Truly is my home away from home. Thank you so much for the experience!

title: We had an AMAZING stay!!
text: We loved our visit here!! It’s surrounded by restaurants and things to do. It’s very walkable! Our room was very comfortable and clean. It was our first time in New York and Kodie not only made our stay extremely comfortable with our unpredictable toddler, but knew all the best places to visit! I think our trip would’ve been completely different without her suggestions! We will definitely be returning!

title: Had a great stay!
text: I stayed with two of my girlfriends for a few nights in a 2 double bed room and this room was huge by NYC standards! I was super surprised. We fit comfortably in the room. Comfy bed and also a full size fridge!! That was really nice to keep our water bottles and leftovers in. The lobby is buzzing and looks like a good place to get food/drinks but we didn't partake. It's right next to a great bagel shop and dessert place. We walked comfortably to Times Square one night-soho the next day and Central Park the next. Convenient location! Freddy at the front desk was super nice and helpful! Would def recommend!!

title: ACE’d It
text: When you walk in your greeted by such a nice aroma ! The bar was live and such a good vibe . I was greeted by the nicest person at the front desk his name was Rudy ! Check in was super easy and fast . The deco of the rooms were boutique like and was clean . The bathroom was equipped with everything you needed . The bed hugged your body and was so comfortable . Overall would recommend this hotel .!!! It was perfect for a stay in the city.. to bad it was for just one night .. the ace aced it for sure !

title: Freddy has done the most for Client Service!
text:
Freddy was amazing, made sure I had the right room and was comfortable! Thank you so much for the amazing service!! I first asked to get a room asap as I had to get ready for an event, and felt the room was too small. After a quick phone call with Freddy he assured me that he could get back the room I was originally supposed to stay and kept my luggage while I was at my event. When I got back I had such a quick check in and the room was beautiful! Thank you so much! 

If I come back I will make sure to stay here!

title: Coolest hotel I have ever stayed in New York (maybe anywhere)
text: This was my son's first trip to NYC and it could not have been better. Everyone at the hotel was stellar.  Our room had a spectacular view of the Empire State Building. The room was amazingly large for a NYC hotel room.  The place was rocking - hippest environment (even for a 70 + guest myself)  Great location - steps away from a subway station that took us everywhere.  Touches like a frig, guitar and turntable in the room made it unique and welcoming. I'll never stay anywhere else in future. Kudos to the hotel and staff!

title: Stay on 3/5
text: Quick trip in for business and had a lovely experience. Rudy at the front desk was absolutely fantastic and kind, as I felt like all the staff I interacted with were, but Rudy truly made my experience! Will definitely be returning

title: Trip en famille
text: Je suis partie 3 jours à Manhattan avec mes deux garçons de 12 et 14 ans.  Nous avons logé dans cet hotel, nous avions demandé une chambre en hauteur avec vus sur l’empire. L’hôtel nous a comblé en nous donnant une chambre au 11 ère étage avec vue sur l’empire ( room 1112). Ambiance très cosy et bar très sympa, les chambres sont grandes et il y’a un bain. Je recommande pour y loger en famille. L’hôtel est à côté de pleins de resto et à 15 m de Times Squares

title: Muy buen servicio y hospitalidad
text: Estuvimos visitando  Nueva York  con mi familia y decidimos quedarnos en este hotel. Nos recibieron con mucho cariño. No hablamos mucho ingles pero Julio se encargo de traducir y también de recomendarnos lugares a visitar y restaurantes. La habitación estaban muy limpias t acogedoras. Definitivamente nos quedaremos en el Ace en el futuro. Gracias!

title: Centrally located hotel with a boutiquefeel
text:
I stayed in this hotel for business, but could see myself returning for vacation too.  Very close to MTA stops and landmarks like the Flat Iron and Empire State. 
 The hotel also contains a nicely appointed lobby bar where you can get coffee or drinks depending on the time of day.

Stayed in a 'small room' which I can see being great for two.  It was minimal in design and had good finishes and art.  Definitely consider booking a room here if you are looking for a hotel with a slightly more local and artsy feel among other big hotel brands.

title: Our yearly NYC visit.
text: This trip has great. But our stay at the Ace Hotel has been great. Especially Freddy at the front desk. He gave us great tips and helped us get some much needed shipping boxes.  Hand delivered them to our room even. He helped us so much. Thanks Feddy.

title: A Groovy Meaningfully Designed Hotel
text:
The Ace  is a boutique Hotel just north of the Flatiron District making attractions like the Empire State Building, Eatery and others within walking distance. A 1904 landmark building, many of the buildings original details including mosaic-tiled floors and coffered ceilings in the lobby have been preserved. The giant lobby exhibits a dual personality: by day is home to laptop workspaces and by night a hip neighborhood bar. The Ace has commissioned numerous artists to create unique installations for rooms and public spaces.

My appreciated Large  room was design-heavy with vintage accoutrements, a cozy seating area and walls featuring customized contemporary art. The room was splashed with funky items like a turntable and a guitar.  The bath had subway tiles, a shower/tub combo with a rain showerhead...........a cool place.

The Ace sports 2 dining options. The lobby bar offers a diverse all-day menu with items ranging from oysters to salmon tartare. My French Onion Soup was delightful, and Fried Chicken sandwich was delightful. The Koloman, a French inspired restaurant, has garnered many culinary accolades, but my short visit didn't allow me to visit.

If you searching  for a buzzy, hip hotel with a lively lobby and museum caliber art.........
......then try the ........Ace Hotel.............A Groovy Meaningfully Designed Hotel.

title: What a great experience!
text: Such a beautiful, earthy and clean hotel. Great  customer service! Julio was absolutely amazing. The room was spotless clean, bed was super comfy. We had brunch at the restaurant and it was absolutely delicious. If you are visiting NYC you must go to this hotel.

title: Excellent service, excellent hotel!
text: My experience was great from the moment we arrived to the ACE. The bellman Julio was extremely helpful from the moment I got out of the taxi. Julio gave me excellent recommendation about art gallery, where to eat and drink and places to see in Brooklyn and got me a cab on the my way to the airport. Highly recommend this hotel. Thanks!

title: Great stay at the Ace Hotel New York
text:
Dear Fredy,
I wanted to take a moment to thank you for the outstanding service you provided during our recent stay at the Ace Hotel New York. Your assistance with the check-out process was truly exceptional, and it made a significant difference in our overall experience.
Your positive attitude and willingness to go above and beyond to ensure our satisfaction truly made a difference in our stay at the Ace Hotel New York.
Thank you again for your exceptional service, Fredy. We look forward to the opportunity to stay at the Ace Hotel New York again, and we hope to have the pleasure of working with you in the future.
Sincerely,
Sofia

title: This must be the place
text:
Spent 3 days. The hotel is in a beautiful post-modern style, with attention to every little detail. the rooms are large, clean and well-kept, with refined furniture and adequate lighting for the style. It makes you experience New York right from the moment you wake up.
The staff is super friendly and helpful, always smiling and ready for any request.
The location is great, for moving up and down inner Manhattan.
I will definitely be back

title: cool vibe in mid-city
text: great pillows, great front desk crew~ bringing personality back to hospitality (freddy is the best), love the smeg refrigerator for all my leftovers.  neighborhood can be a tiny bit loud, but it didn’t keep me from sleeping.

title: Great staff make for a great time
text: We had a great stay at the Ace. Great location to explore the city. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Big shout out to Roy who was super ace and looked after us. Thank you! See you next time Roy.

title: My new home
text: Coolest and warmest hotel!!! My new fave! Has everything you need and more in the room.  Incredibly clean.  Everyone was great and very fun and genuine. Love the bar and hang out place in the lobby. Perfect place to meet a friend and also do some work!

title: Home at ace
text: Always love staying at this ace. Central walking, easy to public transport. Also the staff is very kind and accommodating. Freddie at front desk was a life saver and really helpful this trip, made my stay easy. Thank You!

title: Ask for Freddie.
text: Great hotel near midtown.  Ask for Freddie, he always takes good care of us.  Top notch service from the entire staff.  We will definitely continue to come here anytime we need to stay in the midtown area.

title: Thank you for taking care of us
text: I stayed here with my two teenagers, one of whom had broken her ankle just before our trip. I wish I had remembered the name of the front desk staff so I could acknowledge how helpful they were. We felt so well taken care of and they went above and beyond to make sure my daughter was comfortable and barrier free. You can’t go wrong with The Ace Hotel. The experience is consistent and the staff are genuinely happy to be there. We will continue to return. Thank you!

title: Mr Shullsworth
text: I came to The New York City for the national butler conventions and stayed at the Ace Hotel. Might I say it was the most exceptional hotel experience I’ve ever had. Funny as it is, I learned more from the Ace Hotel then I did at the convention. The pillar to the exceptionalism of the Ace Hotel, the foundation holding the hotel at the top of the food chain is Kodie Harris. She is the Ace Hotel. Without her….the Ace Hotel would crumple off the face of the earth. In my interactions with Mrs Harris, I truly understood what customer service was. If I dare say, when you look up customer service in the dictionary you would see Mrs Harris’s face staring back at your own. Anyone happening to be reading this you HAVE to go witness the magic that is Kodie Harris at the Ace Hotel. Unfortunately I have returned home to Scotland, where I’ve hung up the towel as a butlers, because quite frankly there is no competing with the Kodie Harris.

title: Great place great vibes
text: Great hotel very clean love the vibe. All of the hotel staff was super friendly but I especially loved the Front desk manager, Kodie she was so sweet and helpful. Definitely a must stay hotel I have already recommended to so many

title: The Ace Hotel is my happy place!
text: The ACE is my go-to hotel every time I visit NYC which is usually several times a year. It feels like a homecoming when I walk through the front doors. It's the perfect blend of artful, hip NY with both edge and glamour. The location is perfect, you can walk to anywhere from here, and the subways are nearby as well. The staff here are warm and wonderful. Ask for Jesus or Freddie at the front desk. I stay at Ace Hotels around the world and they do not disappoint.

title: Great stay as usual!!
text: Everytime I stay at The Ace its always an amazing stay. The room was great, the bed is super cozy. I love that you have Stumptown Coffee and Black seed bagel along w/ the lobby menu for breakfast. Kodie is my favorite, Freddy was amazing and always helpful along with the rest of the Front desk & Bell men. I plan on staying here more often since it feels like a home away from home!

title: Caring Staff, Funky Vibe, Clean Spacious room.
text:
I am actually A New Yorker (which of course means I am hard to please). My stay at the ACE was second to none. I booked a loft room to surprise my best friend who always stays there when she is in town. It was a milestone birthday and I wanted to have a small get together of our dear friends from far and wide... (New Jersey;).
Anyhow, I had to do quite a bit of planning and the staff at ACE worked with me every step of the way. I ordered delicious Charcuterie and Champagne from the restaurant and everything including the surprise went off without a hitch. The room was also amazing, Great view of the Empire State building, Tons of windows, huge bathroom with a clawfoot tub and shower. I was on the 9th floor and away from the elevators. The room was quiet and I had a great sleep, very comfy king bed and full sized fridge.
A special shout out to Jesus at the front desk. Adina and Maria for helping with details and food. If you like a very NYC vibe, artsy, edgy, but don't want to sacrifice on comfort/service this is your place. I also like there is a Juicebar and Stumptown coffee attached to the lobby... so no need to go into the freezing February streets for your fix!

title: Fantastic hotel
text: Matt and everyone at the front desk, Concierge were amazing with recommendations for restaurants, directions, and local things to do. The hotel was cosy friendly with a warm atmosphere. The rooms were clean and spacious for New York.

title: Trains
text: The hotel is nice but. I was on the 13 floor and you can hear the subway cars every few mins. go under the hotel. I can't image what it sounds like on the lowwer floors. Staff said no one had ever said anything about it. I find that hard to believe.

title: Hip and Accommodating
text: Excellent room, great location nice quiet area of New York City. Great food downstairs in the lobby great drinks great atmosphere. Front Desk was very helpful when I wanted to upgrade the room when my wife and child were joining. Easily park your car right next-door.

title: Not that clean
text: Very disappointed in the cleanliness of the room.  I expected better based on the reviews. Told the front desk the water would not go down when taking a shower, they said they would look at. They did and left their hair removal tool so we could really be grossed out. Staff is very nice but room was not up to par. Will not be coming again.

title: Highs and lows
text:
This is my third stay at an Ace (twice in Portland), so we knew what we were getting into. 

First, the amazing: the view of the Empire State building was spectacular. 

Second, the great: really roomy, fabulous shower with good pressure, solid bath products, robe, TWO luggage racks ❤️, good sheets, great lobby, super-friendly and helpful staff, clean, location is convenient to Penn Station and you can easily grab a bus up Madison to the Upper East Side museums (this is what people in Manhattan do), Stumptown off the lobby. 

Third, the meh (only 4 stars): our bed was too soft and was kind of sagging in the middle and we were next to the elevator, which was fine for me, but kept my husband up. It was also a little too warm and he had to open the window and run the AC in January (I slept through all of that). 

Also, if you're not used to NYC, please drink the tap water instead of buying bottles. It's good. Really, it is.

title: Great place
text: Love this hotel. Great rooms. The staff is amazing. The staff is super accommodating and go out of their way to help.  Great hotel lobby bar. Love the atmosphere.  This is my office away from home when I’m in nyc.

title: No Hot Water
text: The hotel was great except there was zero hot water my entire visit (01/15/23-01/20/23). I was told by the front desk at check out there was a hot water outage and they would look at adjusting my bill. This was being expensed by my company, so I could care less about that. Taking cold showers in the middle of January in NYC was ridiculous. Hope they can somehow make this right. For a hotel of this caliber, no hot water is unacceptable.

title: LOVE THE ACE
text:
Have not been back to NYC or the Ace since Covid hit, and we were back for 2 nights this January. 

The ACE upgraded our room to a fabulous corner room with views of the Empire State building. Huge room! Lots of light (5 Windows)! AND...a hand written note welcoming us back with drink and breakfast vouchers!

Love the ACE. Friendly staff. Totally rocking public spaces with free wifi! Great example of Retrofuturism. Wow! 

The only thing we did not like was that we had to leave.....

title: Great Stay
text: There was a mistake with the date of my booking. Freddy was so incredibly helpful, patient and reassuring. He worked with us to make it all work. It was a pleasure and I enjoyed being at the hotel more knowing people like Freddy were working at the hotel.

title: My Favorite
text:
Great Hotel, I've stayed there dozens of times because it is comfortable, well located and witty.
I like art and this hotel is artfully designed and well located near Chelsea galleries. In addition a new very delicious restaurant just opened off the lobby.
Also, many of the rooms have a guitar and record turntable.

title: Ace Hotel Manhattan never disappoints!
text: This wasn't my first time at the Ace Hotel in Manhattan, nor will it be my last. This is my favorite place to stay in NYC for a variety of reasons. The location absolutely cannot be beat. The Lobby Bar is a wonderful space, there is a Milk Bar bakery downstairs, all of the hotel staff are so cool, and the rooms can't be beat. I had a double room this time, with an extraordinary view of the Empire State Building, a turntable with curated LPs, a guitar to play, a SMEG fridge as well-stocked mini-bar, and the original art in each room that I've come to love.  On top of all that, a friend told the front desk I'd just lost a family member, and they went out of their way to make me feel extra welcome with a personalized welcome note, drink tickets, and a room upgrade. I love the Ace Hotel Manhattan and can't recommend it highly enough.

title: Loved it
text: Such an awesome hotel. Great location, great vibe. Huge king sized room that was unique. Rates are great post holiday season. We had brunch at the new restaurant next door. Lovely. We will be back. Pic of our view of the Empire State Building from the 11th floor.

title: Séjour parfait
text:
Tout vraiment parfait et le personnel charmant.
Seul bémol, le room service qui ne fonctionne pas après 22h et la taille minuscule de notre sdb (room 1015). Pour le reste la taille de la chambre géniale et le confort des lits était quasi exceptionnel. L’emplacement de l’hôtel est idéal.

title: NYC authentique experience
text: What do you need from One hotel when you travel in vacation?! A good location close to all sightseeing points, near to metro or bus station, connection to JFK airport. Yes, they have them all. But you want to feel like a rockstar in NY. Check the loft room :) guitars, vinyl player and records, a mix of new and vintage style furniture and a extremely confortable bed king size; all things in the right place and amazing view to Empire State Building, 5th avenue and Time Square. The muse is there, you just need to play the music. And if you get hungry just reserve a table to Koloman Restaurant, it’s downstairs with entrance from the lobby and food really rocks. If you’re not hungry, just try the bar covered by the US vintage flag and try any drinks, the atmosphere  will keep you busy few hours or up to midnight. And then you can continue to party in the city anywhere, you already have the NYC identity. Ace services for amazing place. Looking forward to come back.

title: The staff make your stay everything!
text:
Each of the staff members were extremely helpful during our visit. But, Freddy went above and beyond! 

Great location, connected coffee shop, bar, and many nearby restaurants and shops. I highly recommend The Ace Hotel.

title: Not your average hotel
text:
Really glad that we chose Ace Hotel for our Christmas New York visit.  They were great responding to my emails prior to our visit, offering restaurant suggestions and tips.  

Our room was spacious and well laid out (2 double beds for the 3 of us).  Large Smeg fridge in the room, kettle & two mugs (bring your own coffee, tea, milk, teaspoons).  Hairdryer was good too - I have very thick hair and it worked well for me.  

Guitar and record player in the room which we didn't use but quirky and fun.  TV was good.

Dimmer lights was a nice touch.  

Nice products in the bathroom (shampoo, conditioner, shower gel and body lotion).

We discovered the little restaurant for breakfast attached to the hotel (just left as you come out of the lift).  Expensive but the food was delicious.  We didn't use the bar or Milk Bar (also attached to the hotel), but it all looked great.

Great location and a really nice vibe.

title: Strongly reccomend this experience in NY
text: The loft is awesome, we had a view to Empire state building, very comfortable and big bed, pillows the best I ever had in a hotel, very clean room and amenities, a bottle of champagne was waiting for us in the room. Pet friendly hotel, the staff in the reception was very nice and friendly. Definitely a experience to remember, I definitely recommend this hotel, very close to all important points in Manhattan.

title: My go-to hotel in NYC
text:
I had a great stay here over Christmas. The location couldn't be more convenient; right in the heart of midtown. Lovely room with a comfy sofa and a well stocked fridge.
Staff are all friendly and helpful, the lobby bar is also nice. 
The whole place has a very "old school" vibe, and I mean that as the highest compliment; it's not a modern soulless place with no character.
I've stayed here almost every trip I've made to NYC over the last 20 years, and will carry on doing so .

title: My favourite hotel in NYC
text: I love the ace! The staff are incredibly friendly! A fantastic vibe and excellent design! The cocktails aren’t bad either :) my room had an excellent view of the Empire State Building! Totally dreamy! I recently stayed there for Christmas and lost a treasured family ring! It fell out in the elevator when I was removing my gloves and I didn’t realise. I woke up the next day in a panic. Luckily not to worry at the Ace! The amazing staff had found it and tagged it safely in the lost and found at security! A true blessing and Christmas miracle! Thank you Ace hotel!

title: Birthday
text: Stopped by for a friend's birthday for some drinks and ended up being such a lovely time! The vibe is amazing and the drinks are phenomenal ✨️ met Anthony the bartender and he was super helpful with my specific taste:) I don't like to go into the city much but def worth the hike from Brooklyn 😅🤣🥰

title: Mi opiniom
text:
Excelente ubicacion para visitar la ciudad, todo cerca y accesible. El único detalle fue que mi reserva fue para 3 personas y me dieron habitacion para 2 personas. Tuvimos que hacer ajustes porque la otra opcion que me ofrecian era con cargos y no estaba contemplado.
A parte de esto todo lo demas bien.

title: A Great Spot
text: This hotel is perfect in every way.   The location is extremely convenient.   The room was clean, big and funky.  The bed was incredibly comfortable.   I ordered room service and it was fast and delucious.  The front desk staff were friendly.

title: Perfect for my needs!
text:
I wanted a simple inexpensive hotel room In NYC over Christmas and the ace was perfect. Did the pre check in on line ahead of time, so it took minutes to get my key once I arrived. Room was clean with just the right amount of space. 
Be comfortable exploring or figuring out how things work: tv is simple; wifi, no password required; temperature control, play w thermostat and window opening; room service, QR code on card on top of counter. 
All worked for me.

title: For a warm welcome, choose Ace Hotel
text:
Being in Manhattan is generally not the enjoyable experience for me that it is for many others in the world. Especially around the holidays, it is absolutely swarmed with people, and that can be anxiety inducing after two years of being told to avoid crowds. 

Friends, if you are like me, I offer you this respite: the Ace Hotel. 

My husband and I always choose this hotel when we are in the city. The people who work at this establishment are warm, kind, and welcoming. We interacted with the front desk, the bag check, the lobby bar in the evening, and the lobby bar in the morning - every person was genuinely nice. 

The amenities are *cool,* but they are also luxurious. Immediately upon entering the lobby, you’ll get the feeling that this is where you were always meant to be in the City. Oh! And there are some stunning views of the Empire State Building. 

Also, we’ve stayed a handful of times, but ever since our first stay, we are always met with a lovely “welcome back” message in our room.  

I love it here. I’d travel to the city just to stay here.

The only thing that I’d change is that there are no vegan options to eat at the Lobby Bar in the morning or any other time of day. We had plenty of quick options on DoorDash, but for a spot that does everything else so right - this was a surprise to us. 

TL;DR: You will feel a warm welcome as soon as you step inside this beautiful, cool, and luxurious hotel. If you’re vegan, you’ll have to order out if you want a late night snack, but that’s no reason to deprive yourself of an amazing stay from start to finish.

title: Book this Awesome Hotel you won’t be disappointed!
text:
Ironically we booked a different hotel who cancelled on us so Booking.com suggested The Ace! Thank you…just thank you! 
We stayed here over Thanksgiving for a week from Australia. Even before we arrived we had great service. I called a couple of times as I had a few queries and then when we were due to arrive, as our flight was cancelled, so we were arriving much later than excepted. Reyes, was exceptional, friendly and extremely helpful every single time. It was great to finally meet him when we checked in. There were a couple of hiccups, but they were sorted fast and without a fuss. All the staff we met were friendly and couldn’t do enough to ensure we had a great stay. The hotel is in a great location. It’s trendy with a great bar. The rooms are exactly what you need when staying at a NYC hotel. The decor is so funky and there’s a full size SMEG fridge in every room! Thank you for everything I will definitely be recommending you to everyone! Thanks Reyes you’re a credit to the Ace Chain….and thanks David, the Front Desk manager I appreciate the care and understanding you showed! Happy New Year!

title: Freddy's a super star!
text: Very kind customer service, and went above and beyond helping me with some documents. The room was ready right when I arrived! Hotel lobby doubles as a vibey coffee/study lounge with fast Wi-Fi and table seating.

title: Excellent customer service
text: My visit at the Ace was absolutely stellar and have to give a big shoutout to the staff who made staying at a boutique hotel worthwhile. Kodie at the front desk was warm, welcoming, and answered all of my questions (of which there were many) both about the hotel itself as well as recommendations on what to do in the area. I will definitely be staying again!

title: Luck be a lady tonight
text: I had a one-of-a-kind experience at ace.  best location; couple blocks from the flat iron building, Korea town(my favorite), walkable to everything.  walk to central park and the way down to Washington square.  Hop on the N Q R W train a block away.  The crew was lovely and always hooking it up.  *snaps* Check in/out was a breeze, along with bell service... and not to mention the cocktails.  Thanks Ace for treating my friend and me to a one-of-a-kind experience.  thank you.

title: Aces High!
text:
I've been a regular at the Ace Hotel in New York for well over 10 years.  It has the right combination of location / amenities / ambiance / design & staff to keep me coming back.

Retro design of the rooms and public spaces combined with low lighting makes anyone feel instantly cool upon entering.  

Beds are comfortable, products smell great, and rain shower heads + excellent water pressure give an all body massage.

Door & Front Desk teams are always friendly and greet me by name with a smile no matter how long I'm away between stays.  Kodie Harris at the front desk is an absolute delight - I've never not seen her smile.

The Ace NYC is so great it's inspired me to try other Ace properties and I'm never disappointed.

title: A nice stay
text:
Was afraid after reading some rare bad  reviews, and in general the room was well heated, if it’s true the bathroom is more chilly there is nothing to be afraid of, it’s heated !! Water works, bed is comfy, all is fine! It’s anyway sold as an artist in residence, I don’t think no one is naive, yes it’s expensive for what it is, but it’s the same in New York and other hotels were more expensive , far more! In general New York is crazy … so that’s it. I had a good journey, slept very well ! So thank you for that stay . 
Oh I just think the light is not super well done, but as well I saw that in most of the places. There is the minimum lighting . So once you know that you can book to the ace as it’s well situated, it’s comfortable and Pricely not bad .  Again thanks for that journey !

title: Great location and great place to just chill in
text:
Me, brother and a friend couple stayed for a 4-day weekend last week. LOVED IT! There were different format rooms based on the website, and we got a very comfortable room and hotel hooked us up with connecting to our friend's room (booked separately), and they had the best hangout leather couch that was perfect for the saturday that we got rained in. Fridge roomy enough for additional beverages we brought and takeout dessert. Hotel associates were friendly and helpful both day and late night. Parking lot adjacent to property--soo nice to have a short walk with luggages with the chilly weather and have hotel guest rate that beats parking apps for SUV rate. Location is perfect for a no-agenda weekend in midtown we never ran out of places to eat within short walking distanc (even late night), likewise things to do: flatiron, koreatown, leisure walk on 5th to see saks display, garment district. On property you have stumptown, momofuku, le labo, barbershop (we noticed the guys walking out had awesome hair/beard), 260 sample sale (scored some great moschino pieces!)

Ive stayed in another luxury property around midtown that didnt really have much going on around the property, so ace is definitely preferred for the next NYC weekend

title: You have never seen a small hotel room until you stay here.
text: On the plus side, the staff was very friendly. The lobby area was lively. On the downside, this has to be the smallest hotel room I have ever stayed in anywhere. Ever. The bed was so low to the ground, it was basically like sleeping on an air mattress on the floor.  There was no closet, nowhere to put clothes.  It would have been comical, actually, if it hadn’t cost hundreds of dollars a night.  But the staff were really nice.

title: Comfortable, functional and fun
text:
Some of the best hotel staff in NYC - always friendly, relaxed and helpful. A wonderful location and a no frills, no nonsense, functional but sort of cool hotel.

Additionally, it has a very convenient offer with Stumptown coffee, the bagels shop, the juicy shop and even cakes.. Plus luckily they have reopened the restaurant, which was missing lately.

What's truly missing in the room is a coffee machine. Or coffee (even if for the kettle)

Internet is functional but not ultra fast. And the bed could be more comfy (great pillows..yet no the best mattress)... one can get picky I guess....

title: We loved our spacious room and the vibe in the hotel
text: Compliments for the Ace people, they make you feel welcome and create a unique vibe in the hotel. Our room was very spacious and everything was in there! It made us feel home far away from home. The location couldn’t be better.

title: Cold and dark rooms
text: Experienced traveller, 3rd time at Ace Hotel during last 10 years. Unfortunately this hipster hotel needs some updating in order to keep calling itself a boutique hotel. Rooms are very dark, very cold (no heating in the bathroom), there is a kettle but no coffee/tea. We did not have warm water during 48 hours which was a nightmare - we complained 3 times to front desk - but nothing happened. Elevators extremely slow (we lived on 10th floor). If location is most important for you - this is a great one, but if comfort and excellent room experience is important for you - this is not a good choice.

title: Ace Hotel NYC - such a cool vibe!
text: Great stay at the Ace Hotel in NYC with my sixteen year old daughter!  Such a cool vibe, great service and the Loft Suite is quintessential downtown. Check out the old photo booth in the lobby. We will be back soon!

title: Rooms need upkeep and customer service lacks.
text:
Be aware that whatever price is advertised you will be charged an additional $40 “destination fee” without warning. I don’t remember seeing anything about it when I made the reservations so read the fine print carefully. I saw multiple guests at the front desk as about this, obviously everyone feels taken advantage of it like I did. The front desk staff seems so used to getting asked about it they were total jerks about the issue. 

Our room had a funky smell, had residue on the surfaces, and the corner of carpet appeared to have a white mold growing on it. I was afraid to take my shoes and socks off in the room.

title: Disappointing
text:
Stayed for 4 nights in the hotel during a business trip.

The hotels main feature is a busy and lively bar downstairs, one that has character and energy.

The poor review is for the room.

The room itself was tiny, ramshackled, and in need of some serious love.

On arriving I decided somebody was drilling the road outside, it took me 10 minutes to discover it was the radiator in the room banging.  On closer inspection is was falling apart.

Lighting was low, to the point you felt as if you were living in the North Pole during winter.

Finally, the shower was on two occasion cold with no hot water and yellow water came out the tap.

Mentioned much if the above to reception and no action was ever taken.  Don’t think they cared.

Most definitely won’t stay again and I suggest you spend your money elsewhere.

title: ACE NYC
text: We were in NYC with kids and parents, excellent  locations  for those who visit NYC. Well mentioned and spacious room, housekeeper made us so comfortable by servicing our room every day with fresh towels and linen. Every time when we came back to hotel room fells fresh and clean. Convenient to walking and subway. We have to say it was well worth choosing ACE NYC.

title: Most amazing hotel
text:
I have been coming back to ACE Hotel for years. The service is excellent. All the staff are extremely nice and helpful, so you feel like you are in the best hands. Which is also the case. 
It's really the people who work here that make this hotel so special. 
Of course, the wonderful room amenities (the beds are so comfy) are nothing to sneeze at either. 
The breakfast in the restaurant is excellent and again it is the nicest people who work there. Top service.

title: Perfect Location!
text: I booked a stay at Ace NY as I love the Palm Springs location. I was here for the marathon and checked in after the race. It was exactly what I needed. It was a lovely 2 days of recovery and relaxation. The bed was amazingly comfortable and the sheets cozy. After such a long run it was great to take a shower with excellent water pressure and slip into bed and sleep for what felt like 15 hours! It wasn’t and I woke to have a great celebratory night cab in the bar downstairs. Everyone I encountered was great, friendly and helpful. Definitely will return to Ace and any others!

title: True NY Experience
text: The best spot in NYC. I lived on 30th and 3rd when I lived in Manhattan, this is the best neighborhood.  Just a quick walk to the train to jump on the NRW to SoHo to shop or up to Time Square. I walked over to Hudson Yards in the morning. Later I  jumped on the train to get my favorite pizza at Arturo's for dinner. Stumptown gave me a love for black coffee back in 2011, it is a treat! My friend joined me for a drink at the bar at midnight on Friday night. My room was a great size for just me, the bathroom was huge, all clean and comfortable. The staff is so helpful and accommodating. The Ace is such a cool brand, can't beat it.

title: Ace Hotel Loft
text: Stayed in a Loft at the ACE Hotel. I had a great time. Custumer service as soon as you walk in was on point. We were greeted by Steffi at the front desk her welcoming smile and efficient check in process put us at ease. Drinks and food in the cozy lobby bar after a long day of traveling was wonderful. The room is very spacious cozy and everything you would need for a home away from home. 10 out of 10 would stay here again.

title: 5 stars for the front desk crew
text:
This review is for KIMANI and FREDDY at the front desk! 

TLDR; their customer service was great. All and all, I was pleasantly surprised by the friendliness and efficiency from everyone who worked at Ace. 

I checked in early in the AM with Freddy who was working at the time, fully expecting to just drop off my luggage but the room was ready. I went into the room but it all felt a bit too dark for me as it had limited natural light. I debated whether to be "that customer" who complains but I figured it couldn't hurt to ask. So I went back to the front desk to see if I could switch out the room. Freddy made it work though he said that it won't be ready until the normal check in time which was 3pm. He advised for me to grab my things and leave it in the luggage room in the meantime so I could be free to roam and come back later. 

When I got back to the front desk with my luggage, Kimani was there instead. Without missing a beat, he knew exactly what the ask & plan was, and confirmed that I should be all set for the new room later that afternoon. While this may seem like a small thing, it really makes a difference to me. I didn't have to explain the situation again, or feel bad about asking, or worry about potentially not having a new room. Throughout my 4-days stay, I mostly saw Kimani whenever I had ad hoc questions and he was always quick to help me out. 

I did speak to Marcus (I think that was his name) at the front desk one night to comment on how hot my room was. One of the guys from engineering came within 5 minutes and provided a solution. So shout out to them too!

title: Stunning
text: Amazing Vibe. Great location. Friendly but professional team. Rooms are great as well as the bar. Different metro stations near by and plenty of good restaurants and stores in the neighborhood. A place to go to!

title: great location, quiet room, unique
text: This is great location for walking to restaurants, bars and points of interest.  You walk through a lively bar area to register.  The rooms are spacious, surprisingly quiet with  unique  touches.  Our AC/Thermostat did not work at all, so it was a tad warm in the room.  The hotel is very hip with a great vibe. Unique touches in the hotel included cool artwork.  The shower pressure was absolutely amazing - like bucket of rain over you.  Coffee shop downstairs was always packed.  The bar at 1am had run out of most things, except beer.  The front desk was very nice.  We were there for a milestone birthday - I called the front desk to inquire about adding some balloons or Prosecco to our room.  however, since we booked through tripAdvisor, they indicated I would had to call tripAdvisor.  Serious flaw....

title: ACE Hotel New York
text:
I have been a loyal guest of ACE since it first opened . It has always been my favorite because it is unfailingly creative and warm and energetic.

The location was always solid but it has gotten even better over time.

Room staff and desk hosts are friendly and professional; I marvel at the consistent quality of the service.

If you have not visited the ACE online store where you can purchase their crisp and affordable sheets I recommend that you take a look; they are terrific.

title: Ace Hotel 9/26
text: I was greeted by Freddy and he was great! He assisted me and my colleagues with great service and make our stay amazing. He recommended great wine as well! Would definitely stay here again in the future.

title: Excellent overall
text:
The room was comfortable and clean, the lobby dark and cozy. What really made our stay memorable was the friendly service at reception.  Everyone at the front desk was very professional. 
If I could, I'd add another bonus star to this rating for Freddy. He really went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and special for our birthday getaway. Thanks again, Freddy!

title: Cracking spot to stay.
text:
Great hotel in the heart of the city. Funky rooms. Clean and comfortable. Koloma bar next door was amazing. Cocktails were delicious and bar staff very friendly. Really enjoyed our stay here. 
We will definitely be back again in the near future.

title: love the ace
text: felt very well taken care of my the staff here at ACE NYC, especially Freddie. He went above and beyond to make sure my travel companions and I felt the love. from the check in to grabbing coffee in the lobby, had a wonderful stay.  will be back!

title: ACE NYC Comes Through!
text:
Freddy Escorbores and the front desk were so accommodating and polite and ready to come through! Despite some technology-related disruptions, they were able to get us checked-in and escorted us to our rooms! 

ALSO, the lavender latte at the coffee bar in the lobby is amazing!

title: Badly in need of a refresh
text: I booked a room at the Ace because I have stayed at other locations of theirs and found the rooms to be really nice, but boy was I wrong about this location. The hotel is extremely run down, the rooms are shabby and very poorly appointed. They should be charging half the rate they do for the quality of the room. I booked a Queen room and it came with a Full size bed. I attempted to address quality concerns with the manager prior to checking out and was told I didn't bring up the matter soon enough in my stay. I was given a paltry credit of $100 (which was about 5% of the cost of my stay), and offered a discount on a future stay. I was extremely disappointed and will not make the mistake of staying there again, discount or not.

title: It was one for the books!
text:
I made a reservation for my birthday and had requested a tub. When I arrived Freddy welcomed me with a big smile and told me I’d been upgraded to the best tub in the King LOFT on the house! He also gave me a drink ticket, welcomed me back graciously and wished me a happy birthday. It was a lovely start to a fantastic evening that was made even more so by a glorious room with a view. As a fine art painter I really appreciated this! 
I always look forward to my stays at Ace but this went above and beyond. Spectacular service like this is not seen everyday and I would highly recommend a stay in the King LOFT. You will NOT regret it! It does not disappoint. It came with a turntable and some great records to spin as well as a guitar that my friend immediately began playing. What a great surprise! The tub that I was longing for was deep and luxurious and I had a nice long bubble bath soak the next morning after a night of birthday festivities. 
I will truly never forget this night. It was one for the books! Thank you SO MUCH!

title: Wish I could have stayed longer
text: Had a great visit to ACE Hotel New York.  Such a warm, friendly greeting on arrival.  The hotel has a great vibe. The room was the perfect combination of funky and functional. My only complaint is I had to leave.

title: Ace Rating for the Ace Hotel
text:
My three teenagers and I stayed here twice during our NYC-Canada vacation. Excellent access to theater, musicals, museums, Penn Station (for our trip to DC). Pretty much everything. Great vibe in the lounge - seems like a place to be ... went down for an early coffee on Sunday and sat across from Adam Scott (Parks and Rec) who was having coffee and then a meeting. 
   On our last day, my son Charles got lost in Central Park while biking. After waiting for a while, we headed back to the Ace... long story short, he found the NYPD who cruisered him back to the hotel. Big thanks to those officers and huge thanks to the Ace Hotel for brokering his return, in particularly Freddy! Kudos guys.

title: Enjoyable Stay
text: I was impressed with the size, layout and homey feeling the room had. Staff was professional and friendly.  It was close to a garage, transportation and eateries. Definitely would recommend staying there.

title: Great funky hotel!
text: Exceptional kind staff to unique rooms in a great central area, all you could ask for and more! Close to Metro 28th Street Metro Station. Highly recommend...Would stay again. Breakfast available at the bar with reasonable pricing!

title: Not your typical Ace experience
text:
First day into a two-night stay and not doing well so far. Have stayed at other Ace Hotels before and this one leaves a lot to be desired. Issues:

1. No breakfast! “Chef didn’t show up”. On a Sunday, hard to find good breakfast options nearby.
EDIT: Day 2, STILL NO CHEF so no breakfast. What the hec, Ace? You didn’t learn the first time he was a no-show? Even waitress said “yeah he’s a bit lax”.
2. Dimmable lights in room all flicker. Wrong bulbs in them.
3. Safe didn’t work on arrival. Needed security to come change batteries. This stuff should be checked on each new arrival so guests aren’t left waiting half an hour when they need to head out.
4. No complimentary coffee, tea or water. This is not a cheap hotel, I expect at least the same amenities as I get at other hotels.
5. There isn’t even an option to pay for coffee in the room, only for herbal tea bags.
6. Shower and sink drain poorly - quite gross to be standing in a rising pool of water in the shower or waiting for sink to drain as you shave/brush teeth.
7. Record player but no vinyls? Who travels with their vinyls? A set of vinyls in each room would be amazing.
8. The cables for various things like TV or desk lamp are just hanging mid-air or half-coiled. No attention to detail in presentation of them. You can look chic and vintage without looking messy and disheveled.

I’m enjoying New York and was thinking of adding a third night on but it likely won’t be at this hotel.

EDIT: On check out, no queue, gentleman just says good bye, no “how was your stay?” Management appear to have given up at this hotel.

title: Business and Pleasure!!
text: I was in town for a work meeting and stayed at one of the most interesting hotels.  The art is so different and the staff was next level!  Cody at the front desk was so kind and helpful, she was so knowledgeable and wonderful!  I will absolutely be coming back with my wife!!!

title: What A Great Hotel!
text: Super fun hotel with a great vibe and one of the most vibrant lobby areas we have come across. Situated in a great location, the front desk staff were most accommodating.  We were super fortunate to be upgraded to an amazing room (I am on crutches and would have struggled with accessibility in our original allocated room. Shout out in particular to the manager, Jesus and Steffie, who showed great hospitality and service.

title: Great service!
text: Freddy was awesome and gave exceptional service! Visiting from D.C. for my birthday and would definitely recommend staying at Ace Hotel. Rooms were very clean and the bar setup was great. Thank you again Freddy!

title: Birthday Celebration
